title.raw: 《蘇秦列傳》 Biography of Su Qin

sentences.zh: 蘇秦者，東周雒陽人也。

translations.literal: Su Qin was a native of Luoyang in the Eastern Zhou.
translations.idiomatic: Su Qin was a native of Luoyang in the Eastern Zhou.

sentences.zh: 東事師於齊，而習之於鬼谷先生。

translations.literal: In the east, he studied in Qi as a disciple and was instructed by Master Guigu of Ghost Valley.
translations.idiomatic: In the east, he studied in Qi as a disciple and was instructed by Master Guigu of Ghost Valley.

translations.literal: Su Qin was a man from Dong Zhou Luoyang. In the east he served as student in Qi, and studied under Master Guigu.

sentences.zh: 出游數歲，大困而歸。

translations.literal: After wandering for several years, he returned home in dire poverty.
translations.idiomatic: After wandering for several years, he returned home in dire poverty.

sentences.zh: 兄弟嫂妹妻妾竊皆笑之，曰：「周人之俗，治產業，力工商，逐什二以為務。

translations.literal: His brothers, sisters-in-law, wife and concubines all secretly laughed at him, saying: 'The Zhou people's custom is to manage property, apply effort to crafts and commerce, pursue profit twofold as the task.
translations.idiomatic: His brothers, sisters-in-law, wife, and concubines all laughed at him behind his back, saying, "The custom among Zhou people is to manage estates, work in crafts and trade, and pursue double profits as their occupation.

sentences.zh: 今子釋本而事口舌，困，不亦宜乎！」

translations.literal: Now you abandon the root and engage in speech, impoverished, is this not fitting!'
translations.idiomatic: Now you abandon fundamentals and busy yourself with mere talk. That you're impoverished—isn't this only natural?"

sentences.zh: 蘇秦聞之而慚，自傷，乃閉室不出，出其書遍觀之。

translations.literal: Su Qin heard their words and was filled with shame. Wounded in spirit, he shut himself in his room and refused to come out. He brought out all his books and studied them exhaustively.
translations.idiomatic: Su Qin heard their words and was filled with shame. Wounded in spirit, he shut himself in his room and refused to come out. He brought out all his books and studied them exhaustively.

sentences.zh: 曰：「夫士業已屈首受書，而不能以取尊榮，雖多亦奚以為！」

translations.literal: Said: 'A scholar who has already bent head to receive books, yet cannot use them to obtain honor and glory, though many what use are they!'
translations.idiomatic: He said to himself, "A scholar who has already bowed his head to receive instruction in the classics, yet cannot use them to gain honor and glory—what good are they, no matter how many?"

sentences.zh: 於是得《周書》陰符，伏而讀之。

translations.literal: He then obtained the Zhou Book of the Hidden Talisman. Lying prostrate, he studied it intently.
translations.idiomatic: He then obtained the Zhou Book of the Hidden Talisman. Lying prostrate, he studied it intently.

sentences.zh: 期年，以出揣摩，曰：「此可以說當世之君矣。」

translations.literal: One year passed, then emerged to probe and ponder, said: 'This can persuade the rulers of the present age.'
translations.idiomatic: A year passed. Emerging from seclusion, he tested his theories and declared, "With this, I can persuade the rulers of our time."

sentences.zh: 求說周顯王。

translations.literal: He sought an audience to persuade King Xian of Zhou.
translations.idiomatic: He sought an audience to persuade King Xian of Zhou.

sentences.zh: 顯王左右素習知蘇秦，皆少之。

translations.literal: Zhou Xian Wang's attendants long familiar with Su Qin, all belittled him.
translations.idiomatic: King Xian's attendants, long acquainted with Su Qin, all looked down on him.

sentences.zh: 弗信。

translations.literal: They did not believe in him.
translations.idiomatic: They did not believe in him.

translations.literal: After traveling out for several years, greatly impoverished he returned. His brothers, sisters-in-law, wife and concubines all secretly laughed at him, saying: 'The Zhou people's custom is to manage property, apply effort to crafts and commerce, pursue profit twofold as the task. Now you abandon the root and engage in speech, impoverished, is this not fitting!' Su Qin hearing this felt ashamed, wounded himself, then closed his room and did not go out, brought out his books and comprehensively examined them. Said: 'A scholar who has already bent head to receive books, yet cannot use them to obtain honor and glory, though many what use are they!' Then obtained the Zhou Book Yin Talisman, lay prostrate and read it. One year passed, then emerged to probe and ponder, said: 'This can persuade the rulers of the present age.' Sought to persuade Zhou Xian Wang. Zhou Xian Wang's attendants long familiar with Su Qin, all belittled him. Did not trust him.

sentences.zh: 乃西至秦。

translations.literal: He then traveled west to Qin.
translations.idiomatic: He then traveled west to Qin.

sentences.zh: 秦孝公卒。

translations.literal: But Duke Xiao of Qin had already passed away.
translations.idiomatic: But Duke Xiao of Qin had already passed away.

sentences.zh: 說惠王曰：「秦四塞之國，被山帶渭，東有關河，西有漢中，南有巴蜀，北有代馬，此天府也。

translations.literal: Persuaded Hui Wang: 'Qin is a country of four natural barriers, backed by mountains fronting the Wei, east has the passes and Yellow River, west has Han Zhong, south has Ba Shu, north has Dai horses, this is a heavenly storehouse.
translations.idiomatic: He persuaded King Hui, saying, "Qin is a land of four natural barriers, backed by mountains and fronting the Wei River. To the east it has the passes and Yellow River, to the west Hanzhong, to the south Ba and Shu, to the north the horses of Dai. This is a heavenly storehouse.

sentences.zh: 以秦士民之眾，兵法之教，可以吞天下，稱帝而治。」

translations.literal: With Qin's multitude of scholars and people, instruction in military methods, can swallow the world, proclaim emperor and govern.'
translations.idiomatic: With Qin's multitude of scholars and commoners, and its instruction in the arts of war, it can swallow the world, proclaim itself emperor, and rule all under heaven."

sentences.zh: 秦王曰：「毛羽未成，不可以高蜚；

translations.literal: Qin Wang said: 'Feathers and down not yet formed, cannot fly high;
translations.idiomatic: King Hui of Qin replied, "When feathers and down are not yet formed, one cannot fly high;

sentences.zh: 文理未明，不可以并兼。」

translations.literal: Patterns and veins not yet clear, cannot annex others.'
translations.idiomatic: when patterns and veins are not yet clear, one cannot annex others."

sentences.zh: 方誅商鞅，疾辯士，弗用。

translations.literal: At that very moment, they were executing Shang Yang and hated all debaters. Su Qin was not employed.
translations.idiomatic: At that very moment, they were executing Shang Yang and hated all debaters. Su Qin was not employed.

translations.literal: Then went west to Qin. Qin Xiao Gong died. Persuaded Hui Wang: 'Qin is a country of four natural barriers, backed by mountains fronting the Wei, east has the passes and Yellow River, west has Han Zhong, south has Ba Shu, north has Dai horses, this is a heavenly storehouse. With Qin's multitude of scholars and people, instruction in military methods, can swallow the world, proclaim emperor and govern.' Qin Wang said: 'Feathers and down not yet formed, cannot fly high; Patterns and veins not yet clear, cannot annex others.' Just then executing Shang Yang, hated debaters, did not employ him.

sentences.zh: 乃東之趙。

translations.literal: He then traveled east to Zhao.
translations.idiomatic: He then traveled east to Zhao.

sentences.zh: 趙肅侯令其弟成為相，號奉陽君。

translations.literal: King Su of Zhao appointed his younger brother Cheng as prime minister, giving him the title Lord Fengyang.
translations.idiomatic: King Su of Zhao appointed his younger brother Cheng as prime minister, giving him the title Lord Fengyang.

sentences.zh: 奉陽君弗說之。

translations.literal: Lord Fengyang did not favor Su Qin.
translations.idiomatic: Lord Fengyang did not favor Su Qin.

translations.literal: Then went east to Zhao. Zhao Su Hou made his younger brother Cheng prime minister, titled Lord Fengyang. Lord Fengyang did not approve of him.

sentences.zh: 去游燕，歲餘而後得見。

translations.literal: Su Qin departed to travel to Yan. More than a year passed before he obtained an audience.
translations.idiomatic: Su Qin departed to travel to Yan. More than a year passed before he obtained an audience.

sentences.zh: 說燕文侯曰：「燕東有朝鮮、遼東，北有林胡、樓煩，西有雲中、九原，南有♀、易水，地方二千餘里，帶甲數十萬，車六百乘，騎六千匹，粟支數年。

translations.literal: Persuaded Yan Wen Hou: 'Yan east has Chaoxian, Liaodong, north has Lin Hu, Lou Fan, west has Yun Zhong, Jiu Yuan, south has Callery Pear, Yi Water, territory two thousand li square, armored troops several tens of thousands, chariots six hundred, cavalry six thousand horses, grain sufficient for several years.
translations.idiomatic: He persuaded King Wen of Yan, saying, "Yan has Chaoxian and Liaodong to the east, Linhu and Loufan to the north, Yunzhong and Jiuyuan to the west, and the Ji and Yi Rivers to the south. Its territory spans more than two thousand square li, with several hundred thousand armored troops, six hundred chariots, six thousand cavalry horses, and grain supplies sufficient for several years.

sentences.zh: 南有碣石、鴈門之饒，北有棗栗之利，民雖不佃作而足於棗栗矣。

translations.literal: To the south it has the wealth of Jieshi and Yanmen; to the north, the bounty of dates and chestnuts. The people need not till the fields—dates and chestnuts alone suffice them."
translations.idiomatic: To the south it has the wealth of Jieshi and Yanmen; to the north, the bounty of dates and chestnuts. The people need not till the fields—dates and chestnuts alone suffice them.

sentences.zh: 此所謂天府者也。

translations.literal: "This is what is called a heavenly storehouse.
translations.idiomatic: This is what is called a heavenly storehouse."

translations.literal: Departed to travel Yan, more than a year then obtained audience. Persuaded Yan Wen Hou: 'Yan east has Chaoxian, Liaodong, north has Lin Hu, Lou Fan, west has Yun Zhong, Jiu Yuan, south has Callery Pear, Yi Water, territory two thousand li square, armored troops several tens of thousands, chariots six hundred, cavalry six thousand horses, grain sufficient for several years. sentences.zh: 「夫安樂無事，不見覆軍殺將，無過燕者。

translations.literal: 'Peace and joy without affairs, not seeing overturned armies killed generals, none surpass Yan.
translations.idiomatic: "Moreover, in peace and contentment without troubles, in not seeing armies routed and generals slain, none surpass Yan.

sentences.zh: 大王知其所以然乎？

translations.literal: Does great king know the reason?
translations.idiomatic: Does Your Majesty know the reason for this?"

sentences.zh: 夫燕之所以不犯寇被甲兵者，以趙之為蔽其南也。

translations.literal: "The reason Yan does not suffer from bandits and armored troops is that Zhao serves as a shield to the south.
translations.idiomatic: The reason Yan does not suffer from bandits and armored troops is that Zhao serves as a shield to the south.

sentences.zh: 秦趙五戰，秦再勝而趙三勝。

translations.literal: In five battles between Qin and Zhao, Qin won twice but Zhao won three times.
translations.idiomatic: In five battles between Qin and Zhao, Qin won twice but Zhao won three times.

sentences.zh: 秦趙相斃，而王以全燕制其後，此燕之所以不犯寇也。

translations.literal: Qin and Zhao exhaust each other, while Your Majesty, with Yan intact, controls their rear. This is why Yan does not suffer from bandits.
translations.idiomatic: Qin and Zhao exhaust each other, while Your Majesty, with Yan intact, controls their rear. This is why Yan does not suffer from bandits.

sentences.zh: 且夫秦之攻燕也，踰雲中、九原，過代、上谷，彌地數千里，雖得燕城，秦計固不能守也。

translations.literal: Moreover, when Qin attacks Yan, it must cross Yunzhong and Jiuyuan, pass through Dai and Shanggu, traversing thousands of li of territory. Even if Qin captures Yan cities, by its own calculations it certainly cannot hold them.
translations.idiomatic: Moreover, when Qin attacks Yan, it must cross Yunzhong and Jiuyuan, pass through Dai and Shanggu, traversing thousands of li of territory. Even if Qin captures Yan cities, by its own calculations it certainly cannot hold them.

sentences.zh: 秦之不能害燕亦明矣。

translations.literal: That Qin cannot harm Yan is abundantly clear.
translations.idiomatic: That Qin cannot harm Yan is abundantly clear.

sentences.zh: 今趙之攻燕也，發號出令，不至十日而數十萬之軍軍於東垣矣。

translations.literal: Now when Zhao attacks Yan, it issues orders and commands, and in less than ten days, hundreds of thousands of troops are encamped at Dongyuan.
translations.idiomatic: Now when Zhao attacks Yan, it issues orders and commands, and in less than ten days, hundreds of thousands of troops are encamped at Dongyuan.

sentences.zh: 渡嘑沱，涉易水，不至四五日而距國都矣。

translations.literal: They cross the Zhuodu and ford the Yi River, and in no more than four or five days they threaten the capital itself.
translations.idiomatic: They cross the Zhuodu and ford the Yi River, and in no more than four or five days they threaten the capital itself.

sentences.zh: 故曰秦之攻燕也，戰於千里之外；

translations.literal: Therefore said Qin attacks Yan, battles at thousand li outside;
translations.idiomatic: Therefore it is said that when Qin attacks Yan, the battle is fought a thousand li away;

sentences.zh: 趙之攻燕也，戰於百里之內。

translations.literal: when Zhao attacks Yan, the battle is fought within a hundred li.
translations.idiomatic: When Zhao attacks Yan, the battle is fought within a hundred li.

sentences.zh: 夫不憂百里之患而重千里之外，計無過於此者。

translations.literal: To not worry about danger a hundred li away while prizing security a thousand li distant—no strategy surpasses this.
translations.idiomatic: To not worry about danger a hundred li away while prizing security a thousand li distant—no strategy surpasses this.

sentences.zh: 是故願大王與趙從親，天下為一，則燕國必無患矣。」

translations.literal: Therefore wish great king with Zhao form close alliance, world becomes one, then Yan state certainly without danger.'
translations.idiomatic: Therefore I wish Your Majesty to ally closely with Zhao, unite the world as one, and then Yan will certainly be without danger."

The reason Yan does not suffer bandits don armor is because Zhao serves as screen to the south. Qin Zhao five battles, Qin won twice but Zhao won three times. sentences.zh: 文侯曰：「子言則可，然吾國小，西迫彊趙，南近齊，齊、趙彊國也。

translations.literal: Wen Hou said: 'Your words are acceptable, however my state is small, west pressed by strong Zhao, south near Qi, Qi Zhao are strong states.
translations.idiomatic: King Wen replied, "Your words are persuasive, but my state is small, pressed from the west by mighty Zhao and bordering Qi to the south. Qi and Zhao are powerful states.

sentences.zh: 子必欲合從以安燕，寡人請以國從。」

translations.literal: You must wish to combine vertically to secure Yan, I request with state to follow.'
translations.idiomatic: If you wish to form a vertical alliance to secure Yan, I will commit my entire state to following you."

translations.idiomatic: The king then provided Su Qin with chariots, horses, gold, and silk for his journey to Zhao.

translations.literal: Lord Fengyang already dead, immediately took advantage to persuade Zhao Su Hou: 'World officials ministers and common scholars, all esteem your lordship's conduct and righteousness, all wish to offer teachings demonstrate loyalty before you for a long time.
translations.idiomatic: Lord Fengyang had already died, so Su Qin took advantage of this to persuade King Su of Zhao, saying, "All the officials, ministers, and common scholars throughout the world esteem Your Majesty's conduct and righteousness. sentences.zh: 雖然，奉陽君而君不任事，是以賓客游士莫敢自盡於前者。

translations.literal: However, because Lord Fengyang handled affairs and Your Majesty did not, the guest officials and wandering scholars dared not exhaust themselves in service before you.
translations.idiomatic: However, because Lord Fengyang handled affairs and Your Majesty did not, the guest officials and wandering scholars dared not exhaust themselves in service before you.

translations.literal: 'Secretly for your lordship planning, none better than pacify people without affairs, moreover no need trouble affairs with people.
translations.idiomatic: "In my humble opinion for Your Majesty's consideration, nothing is better than pacifying the people and avoiding troubles. Moreover, there is no need to impose affairs upon the people.

translations.literal: Pacifying people's foundation lies in choosing alliances, choosing alliances correctly then people secure, choosing alliances incorrectly then people lifelong insecure.
translations.idiomatic: The foundation of pacifying the people lies in choosing alliances. Choose correctly and the people will be secure; choose incorrectly and the people will be insecure for life.

translations.literal: Permit me to speak of external dangers: Qi and Qin as two enemies people cannot be secure, rely on Qin attack Qi people cannot be secure, rely on Qi attack Qin people cannot be secure.'

translations.idiomatic: Therefore, when plotting against others' rulers and attacking others' states, one always suffers from issuing words that break others' alliances.

translations.literal: I wish Your Majesty to be careful not to let such words escape your lips.
translations.idiomatic: I wish Your Majesty to be careful not to let such words escape your lips.

translations.literal: Permit me to distinguish black and white, only yin and yang.
translations.idiomatic: Permit me to distinguish black and white—the difference is only yin and yang.

translations.literal: Now great king allies with Qin, then Qin certainly weakens Han Wei;
translations.idiomatic: 'Now if Your Majesty allies with Qin, then Qin will certainly weaken Han and Wei;

translations.literal: Allies with Qi, then Qi certainly weakens Chu Wei.
translations.idiomatic: If you ally with Qi, then Qi will certainly weaken Chu and Wei.

translations.idiomatic: If Wei weakens, it will cede the lands beyond the Yellow River; if Han weakens, it will surrender Yiyang. translations.idiomatic: 'If Qin descends the Zhi Road, then Nanyang will be endangered;

translations.idiomatic: If Qin coerces Han and surrounds Zhou, then the Zhao clan will personally handle troops;

translations.idiomatic: If Qin occupies Wei and takes Juan, then Qi must enter the court of Qin.

sentences.zh: 秦欲已得乎山東，則必舉兵而向趙矣。

translations.literal: Qin desires to obtain Shandong, then must raise troops toward Zhao.
translations.idiomatic: If Qin desires to obtain Shandong, it must raise troops and turn toward Zhao.

sentences.zh: 秦甲渡河踰漳，據番吾，則兵必戰於邯鄲之下矣。

translations.literal: Qin armor crosses Yellow River surpasses Zhang, occupies Fan Wu, then troops must battle below Handan.
translations.idiomatic: If Qin armor crosses the Yellow River and surpasses the Zhang, occupying Fanwu, then troops must battle below Handan.

sentences.zh: 此臣之所為君患也。

translations.literal: This minister reason for worrying for your lordship.
translations.idiomatic: This is the reason your minister worries for Your Lordship.

translations.literal: When Qin descends Zhi Road, then Nanyang endangered; Coerces Han surrounds Zhou, then Zhao clan personally handles troops; Occupies Wei takes Juan, then Qi must enter court Qin. Qin desires to obtain Shandong, then must raise troops toward Zhao. Qin armor crosses Yellow River surpasses Zhang, occupies Fan Wu, then troops must battle below Handan. This minister reason for worrying for your lordship.

sentences.zh: 「當今之時，山東之建國莫彊於趙。

translations.literal: At present time, Shandong established states none stronger than Zhao.
translations.idiomatic: 'At the present time, among the established states of Shandong, none is stronger than Zhao.

sentences.zh: 趙地方二千餘里，帶甲數十萬，車千乘，騎萬匹，粟支數年。

translations.literal: Zhao territory two thousand li square, armored troops several tens of thousands, chariots thousand, cavalry ten thousand horses, grain sufficient several years.
translations.idiomatic: Zhao's territory spans more than two thousand square li, with several hundred thousand armored troops, a thousand chariots, ten thousand cavalry horses, and grain sufficient for several years.

sentences.zh: 西有常山，南有河漳，東有清河，北有燕國。

translations.literal: West has Chang Mountain, south has Yellow River Zhang, east has Qing River, north has Yan state.
translations.idiomatic: To the west it has Chang Mountain, to the south the Yellow River and Zhang, to the east the Qing River, and to the north the state of Yan.

sentences.zh: 燕固弱國，不足畏也。

translations.literal: Yan certainly weak state, not worth fearing.
translations.idiomatic: Yan is certainly a weak state, not worth fearing.

sentences.zh: 秦之所害於天下者莫如趙，然而秦不敢舉兵伐趙者，何也？

translations.literal: Qin harm to world none like Zhao, yet Qin dares not raise troops attack Zhao, why?
translations.idiomatic: Among those whom Qin harms in the world, none compares to Zhao, yet Qin dares not raise troops to attack Zhao. Why is this?

sentences.zh: 畏韓、魏之議其後也。

translations.literal: Fears Han Wei discussing their rear.
translations.idiomatic: It fears that Han and Wei will attack its rear.

sentences.zh: 然則韓、魏，趙之南蔽也。

translations.literal: Then Han Wei are Zhao southern screen.
translations.idiomatic: Thus Han and Wei are Zhao's southern shield.

sentences.zh: 秦之攻韓、魏也，無有名山大川之限，稍蠶食之，傅國都而止。

translations.literal: Qin attacks Han Wei, no famous mountains great rivers limit, gradually nibbling them, approaching national capitals then stops.
translations.idiomatic: When Qin attacks Han and Wei, there are no famous mountains or great rivers to limit it. It gradually nibbles away at them, approaching their national capitals and then stops.

sentences.zh: 韓、魏不能支秦，必入臣於秦。

translations.literal: Han Wei cannot withstand Qin, must enter as ministers to Qin.
translations.idiomatic: Han and Wei cannot withstand Qin and must become ministers to Qin.

sentences.zh: 秦無韓、魏之規，則禍必中於趙矣。

translations.literal: Qin without Han Wei monitoring, calamity must hit Zhao.
translations.idiomatic: If Qin lacks the monitoring of Han and Wei, then calamity must strike Zhao.

sentences.zh: 此臣之所為君患也。

translations.literal: This minister reason for worrying for your lordship.
translations.idiomatic: This is the reason your minister worries for Your Lordship.

translations.literal: At present time, Shandong established states none stronger than Zhao. Zhao territory two thousand li square, armored troops several tens of thousands, chariots thousand, cavalry ten thousand horses, grain sufficient several years. West has Chang Mountain, south has Yellow River Zhang, east has Qing River, north has Yan state. Yan certainly weak state, not worth fearing. Qin harm to world none like Zhao, yet Qin dares not raise troops attack Zhao, why? Fears Han Wei discussing their rear. Then Han Wei are Zhao southern screen. Qin attacks Han Wei, no famous mountains great rivers limit, gradually nibbling them, approaching national capitals then stops. Han Wei cannot withstand Qin, must enter as ministers to Qin. Qin without Han Wei monitoring, calamity must hit Zhao. This minister reason for worrying for your lordship.

sentences.zh: 「臣聞堯無三夫之分，舜無咫尺之地，以有天下；

translations.literal: Minister heard Yao without three men portion, Shun without foot inch land, to have world;
translations.idiomatic: 'Your minister has heard that Yao had no portion for three men, Shun had no land the size of a foot or inch, yet they possessed the world;

sentences.zh: 禹無百人之聚，以王諸侯；

translations.literal: Yu without hundred men gathering, to king feudal lords;
translations.idiomatic: Yu had no gathering of a hundred men, yet he became king of the feudal lords;

sentences.zh: 湯武之士不過三千，車不過三百乘，卒不過三萬，立為天子：誠得其道也。

translations.literal: Tang Wu soldiers not exceeding three thousand, chariots not exceeding three hundred, troops not exceeding thirty thousand, established as Son of Heaven: truly obtained their way.
translations.idiomatic: Tang and Wu had soldiers not exceeding three thousand, chariots not exceeding three hundred, and troops not exceeding thirty thousand, yet they were established as Sons of Heaven: truly they obtained the Way.

sentences.zh: 是故明主外料其敵之彊弱，內度其士卒賢不肖，不待兩軍相當而勝敗存亡之機固已形於胸中矣，豈揜於眾人之言而以冥冥決事哉！

translations.literal: Therefore enlightened rulers externally measure enemy strength weakness, internally assess their soldiers worthy unworthy, not waiting for two armies to confront the victory defeat survival extinction mechanisms already formed in chest, how can they be obscured by crowd words and decide affairs in darkness!
translations.idiomatic: Therefore enlightened rulers externally measure the strength and weakness of their enemies, internally assess whether their soldiers are worthy or unworthy. Without waiting for the two armies to confront each other, the mechanisms of victory, defeat, survival, and extinction are already formed in their chests. How can they be obscured by the words of the crowd and decide affairs in darkness!

translations.literal: Minister heard Yao without three men portion, Shun without foot inch land, to have world; Yu without hundred men gathering, to king feudal lords; Tang Wu soldiers not exceeding three thousand, chariots not exceeding three hundred, troops not exceeding thirty thousand, established as Son of Heaven: truly obtained their way. Therefore enlightened rulers externally measure enemy strength weakness, internally assess their soldiers worthy unworthy, not waiting for two armies to confront the victory defeat survival extinction mechanisms already formed in chest, how can they be obscured by crowd words and decide affairs in darkness!

sentences.zh: 「臣竊以天下之地圖案之，諸侯之地五倍於秦，料度諸侯之卒十倍於秦，六國為一，并力西鄉而攻秦，秦必破矣。

translations.literal: Minister secretly with world land maps examines it, feudal lords land five times Qin, estimate feudal lords troops ten times Qin, six states become one, combine strength west face attack Qin, Qin must break.
translations.idiomatic: 'Your minister has secretly examined the maps of the world's lands: the feudal lords' lands are five times Qin's, their troops ten times Qin's. If the six states unite as one and combine their strength to face west and attack Qin, Qin must surely be broken.

sentences.zh: 今西面而事之，見臣於秦。

translations.literal: Now west face serve them, see ministers in Qin.
translations.idiomatic: Now we face west and serve them, appearing as ministers in Qin.

sentences.zh: 夫破人之與破於人也，臣人之與臣於人也，豈可同日而論哉！

translations.literal: Breaking others versus being broken by others, ministering others versus being ministered by others, how can be discussed same day!
translations.idiomatic: Now breaking others versus being broken by others, ministering to others versus being ministered to by others—how can these be discussed on the same day!

translations.literal: Minister secretly with world land maps examines it, feudal lords land five times Qin, estimate feudal lords troops ten times Qin, six states become one, combine strength west face attack Qin, Qin must break. Now west face serve them, see ministers in Qin. Breaking others versus being broken by others, ministering others versus being ministered by others, how can be discussed same day!

sentences.zh: 「夫衡人者，皆欲割諸侯之地以予秦。

translations.literal: Those balancing people, all desire divide feudal lords land to give Qin.
translations.idiomatic: 'Those who engage in horizontal alliances all desire to divide the feudal lords' lands to give to Qin.

sentences.zh: 秦成，則高臺榭，美宮室，聽竽瑟之音，前有樓闕軒轅，後有長姣美人，國被秦患而不與其憂。

translations.literal: Qin succeeds, then high towers terraces, beautiful palaces, listen to reed flute zither sounds, front has tower gates carriages, rear has tall beauties, state suffers Qin calamity without sharing their worry.
translations.idiomatic: If Qin succeeds, then they build high towers and terraces, beautiful palaces, and listen to the sounds of reed pipes and zithers. In front they have tower gates and carriages; in the rear, tall and beautiful women. The states suffer Qin's calamities without the Qin sharing their worries.

sentences.zh: 是故夫衡人日夜務以秦權恐愒諸侯以求割地，故願大王孰計之也。

translations.literal: Therefore balancing people day night strive with Qin authority frighten threaten feudal lords to seek cede land, therefore wish great king carefully calculate it.
translations.idiomatic: Therefore those who engage in horizontal alliances strive day and night with Qin's authority to frighten and threaten the feudal lords to seek the ceding of land. Therefore I wish Your Majesty to carefully calculate this.

translations.literal: Those balancing people, all desire divide feudal lords land to give Qin. Qin succeeds, then high towers terraces, beautiful palaces, listen to reed flute zither sounds, front has tower gates carriages, rear has tall beauties, state suffers Qin calamity without sharing their worry. Therefore balancing people day night strive with Qin authority frighten threaten feudal lords to seek cede land, therefore wish great king carefully calculate it.

sentences.zh: 「臣聞明主絕疑去讒，屏流言之跡，塞朋黨之門，故尊主廣地彊兵之計臣得陳忠於前矣。

translations.literal: Minister heard enlightened rulers cut off doubts remove slanderers, block rumors tracks, close faction doors, therefore honorable lord broaden land strengthen troops plans minister can demonstrate loyalty before.
translations.idiomatic: 'Your minister has heard that enlightened rulers cut off doubts and remove slanderers, block the tracks of rumors, and close the doors of factions. Therefore the plans to honor the lord, broaden lands, and strengthen troops allow your minister to demonstrate loyalty before you.

sentences.zh: 故竊為大王計，莫如一韓、魏、齊、楚、燕、趙以從親，以畔秦。

translations.literal: Therefore secretly for great king planning, none better than unite Han Wei Qi Chu Yan Zhao to form close alliance, to rebel against Qin.
translations.idiomatic: Therefore in secretly planning for Your Majesty, nothing is better than uniting Han, Wei, Qi, Chu, Yan, and Zhao to form a close alliance and rebel against Qin.

sentences.zh: 令天下之將相會於洹水之上，通質，刳白馬而盟。

translations.literal: Order world generals ministers meet above Huan Water, exchange hostages, cut white horse make covenant.
translations.idiomatic: Order the world's generals and ministers to meet above the Huan River, exchange hostages, cut open a white horse, and form a covenant.

sentences.zh: 要約曰：『秦攻楚，齊、魏各出銳師以佐之，韓絕其糧道，趙涉河漳，燕守常山之北。

translations.literal: Pact says: Qin attacks Chu, Qi Wei each send sharp troops to aid it, Han cut its grain roads, Zhao ford Yellow River Zhang, Yan guard Chang Mountain north.
translations.idiomatic: The covenant states: 'If Qin attacks Chu, Qi and Wei will each send elite troops to aid it; Han will cut its grain routes; Zhao will ford the Yellow River and Zhang; Yan will guard north of Chang Mountain.

sentences.zh: 秦攻韓魏，則楚絕其後，齊出銳師而佐之，趙涉河漳，燕守雲中。

translations.literal: Qin attacks Han Wei, then Chu cut its rear, Qi send sharp troops aid it, Zhao ford Yellow River Zhang, Yan guard Yun Zhong.
translations.idiomatic: If Qin attacks Han or Wei, then Chu will cut its rear; Qi will send elite troops to aid it; Zhao will ford the Yellow River and Zhang; Yan will guard Yunzhong.

sentences.zh: 秦攻齊，則楚絕其後，韓守城皋，魏塞其道，趙涉河漳、博關，燕出銳師以佐之。

translations.literal: Qin attacks Qi, then Chu cut its rear, Han guard Cheng Gao, Wei block its roads, Zhao ford Yellow River Zhang Bo Pass, Yan send sharp troops aid it.
translations.idiomatic: If Qin attacks Qi, then Chu will cut its rear; Han will guard Chenggao; Wei will block its roads; Zhao will ford the Yellow River, Zhang, and Bo Pass; Yan will send elite troops to aid it.

sentences.zh: 秦攻燕，則趙守常山，楚軍武關，齊涉勃海，韓、魏皆出銳師以佐之。

translations.literal: Qin attacks Yan, then Zhao guard Chang Mountain, Chu army Wu Pass, Qi ford Bo Sea, Han Wei all send sharp troops aid it.
translations.idiomatic: If Qin attacks Yan, then Zhao will guard Chang Mountain; Chu will deploy troops at Wu Pass; Qi will ford the Bohai; Han and Wei will both send elite troops to aid it.

sentences.zh: 秦攻趙，則韓軍宜陽，楚軍武關，魏軍河外，齊涉清河，燕出銳師以佐之。

translations.literal: Qin attacks Zhao, then Han army Yi Yang, Chu army Wu Pass, Wei army beyond Yellow River, Qi ford Qing River, Yan send sharp troops aid it.
translations.idiomatic: If Qin attacks Zhao, then Han will deploy troops at Yiyang; Chu at Wu Pass; Wei beyond the Yellow River; Qi will ford the Qing River; Yan will send elite troops to aid it.

sentences.zh: 諸侯有不如約者，以五國之兵共伐之。』

translations.literal: Feudal lords have not following pact, with five states troops together attack them.
translations.idiomatic: If any of the feudal lords does not follow the covenant, the five states will together attack them.'

sentences.zh: 六國從親以賓秦，則秦甲必不敢出於函谷以害山東矣。

translations.literal: Six states form close alliance to oppose Qin, then Qin armor certainly dares not emerge from Hangu to harm Shandong.
translations.idiomatic: If the six states form a close alliance to oppose Qin, then Qin's armored troops will certainly not dare emerge from Hangu Pass to harm Shandong.

sentences.zh: 如此，則霸王之業成矣。」

translations.literal: Like this, then hegemon king enterprise completed.
translations.idiomatic: In this way, the enterprise of becoming hegemon and king will be accomplished."

translations.literal: Minister heard enlightened rulers cut off doubts remove slanderers, block rumors tracks, close faction doors, therefore honorable lord broaden land strengthen troops plans minister can demonstrate loyalty before. Therefore secretly for great king planning, none better than unite Han Wei Qi Chu Yan Zhao to form close alliance, to rebel against Qin. Order world generals ministers meet above Huan Water, exchange hostages, cut white horse make covenant. Pact says: Qin attacks Chu, Qi Wei each send sharp troops to aid it, Han cut its grain roads, Zhao ford Yellow River Zhang, Yan guard Chang Mountain north. Qin attacks Han Wei, then Chu cut its rear, Qi send sharp troops aid it, Zhao ford Yellow River Zhang, Yan guard Yun Zhong. Qin attacks Qi, then Chu cut its rear, Han guard Cheng Gao, Wei block its roads, Zhao ford Yellow River Zhang Bo Pass, Yan send sharp troops aid it. Qin attacks Yan, then Zhao guard Chang Mountain, Chu army Wu Pass, Qi ford Bo Sea, Han Wei all send sharp troops aid it. Qin attacks Zhao, then Han army Yi Yang, Chu army Wu Pass, Wei army beyond Yellow River, Qi ford Qing River, Yan send sharp troops aid it. Feudal lords have not following pact, with five states troops together attack them. Six states form close alliance to oppose Qin, then Qin armor certainly dares not emerge from Hangu to harm Shandong. Like this, then hegemon king enterprise completed.

sentences.zh: 趙王曰：「寡人年少，立國日淺，未嘗得聞社稷之長計也。

translations.literal: Zhao Wang said: "I am young, established state not long, never heard state long plans.
translations.idiomatic: The King of Zhao said: 'I am young and my state was established not long ago. I have never heard the long-term plans for the state.

sentences.zh: 今上客有意存天下，安諸侯寡人敬以國從。」

translations.literal: Now honored guest has intention preserve world, secure feudal lords I respectfully with state follow."
translations.idiomatic: Now this honored guest has the intention to preserve the world and secure the feudal lords. I respectfully follow with my state.'

sentences.zh: 乃飾車百乘，黃金千溢，白璧百雙，錦繡千純，以約諸侯。

translations.literal: Then adorned chariots hundred, gold thousand yi, white jade hundred pairs, brocade thousand bolts, to make pact with feudal lords.
translations.idiomatic: He then adorned a hundred chariots, a thousand yi of gold, a hundred pairs of white jade, and a thousand bolts of brocade to make a pact with the feudal lords.

translations.literal: Zhao Wang said: "I am young, established state not long, never heard state long plans. Now honored guest has intention preserve world, secure feudal lords I respectfully with state follow." Then adorned chariots hundred, gold thousand yi, white jade hundred pairs, brocade thousand bolts, to make pact with feudal lords.

sentences.zh: 是時周天子致文武之胙於秦惠王。

translations.literal: At this time Zhou Son of Heaven sent Wen Wu sacrificial meat to Qin Hui Wang.
translations.idiomatic: At this time, the Zhou Son of Heaven sent the sacrificial meats of Wen and Wu to King Hui of Qin.

sentences.zh: 惠王使犀首攻魏，禽將龍賈，取魏之雕陰，且欲東兵。

translations.literal: Hui Wang made Xi Shou attack Wei, captured general Long Jia, took Wei carving Yin, moreover wished east troops.
translations.idiomatic: King Hui sent Xi Shou to attack Wei, captured the general Long Jia, took Wei's Diaoyin, and moreover wished to deploy troops eastward.

sentences.zh: 蘇秦恐秦兵之至趙也，乃激怒張儀，入之于秦。

translations.literal: Su Qin feared Qin troops coming to Zhao, then provoked angered Zhang Yi, entered him into Qin.
translations.idiomatic: Su Qin feared that Qin troops would come to Zhao, so he provoked and angered Zhang Yi, bringing him into Qin.

translations.literal: At this time Zhou Son of Heaven sent Wen Wu sacrificial meat to Qin Hui Wang. Hui Wang made Xi Shou attack Wei, captured general Long Jia, took Wei carving Yin, moreover wished east troops. Su Qin feared Qin troops coming to Zhao, then provoked angered Zhang Yi, entered him into Qin.

sentences.zh: 於是說韓宣王曰：「韓北有鞏、成皋之固，西有宜陽、商阪之塞，東有宛、穰、洧水，南有陘山，地方九百餘里，帶甲數十萬，天下之彊弓勁弩皆從韓出。

translations.literal: Then persuaded Han Xuan Wang: "Han north has Gong, Cheng Gao stronghold, west has Yi Yang, Shang Ban pass, east has Wan, Rang, Wei Water, south has Xiong Mountain, territory nine hundred li square, armored troops several tens of thousands, world strong bows stout crossbows all from Han out.
translations.idiomatic: Then he persuaded King Xuan of Han, saying: 'Han to the north has the stronghold of Gong and Chenggao, to the west the passes of Yiyang and Shangban, to the east Wan, Rang, and the Wei River, to the south Mount Xiong. Its territory spans more than nine hundred square li, with several hundred thousand armored troops. All the world's strong bows and stout crossbows come from Han.

sentences.zh: 谿子、少府時力、距來者，皆射六百步之外。

translations.literal: Xi Zi, Shao Fu timely strength, Ju Lai, all shoot six hundred paces outside.
translations.idiomatic: Xizi, Shaofu Shili, and Julai—all can shoot beyond six hundred paces.

sentences.zh: 韓卒超足而射，百發不暇止，遠者括蔽洞胸，近者鏑弇心。

translations.literal: Han troops extraordinary feet shoot, hundred shots not pause stop, far ones arrows cover pierce chest, near ones arrowheads hit heart.
translations.idiomatic: Han troops can shoot while running extraordinarily fast—a hundred shots without pause. The distant ones' arrows cover and pierce the chest; the near ones' arrowheads hit the heart.

sentences.zh: 韓卒之劍戟皆出於冥山、棠谿、墨陽、合賻、鄧師、宛馮、龍淵、太阿，皆陸斷牛馬，水截鵠鴈，當敵則斬堅甲鐵幕，革抉跋芮，無不畢具。

translations.literal: Han troops swords halberds all from Ming Mountain, Tang Xi, Mo Yang, He Cun, Deng Shi, Wan Ping, Long Yuan, Tai E, all land cut cow horse, water sever swans geese, facing enemy then chop firm armor iron screens, leather pull overturn horses, nothing not completely prepared.
translations.idiomatic: The swords and halberds of Han troops all come from Ming Mountain, Tangxi, Moyang, Hecun, Dengshi, Wanping, Longyuan, and Tai'e. On land they can cut through cows and horses; on water they can sever swans and geese. When facing the enemy, they chop through firm armor and iron screens, pull leather and overturn horses—nothing is not completely prepared.

sentences.zh: 以韓卒之勇，被堅甲，蹠勁弩，帶利劍，一人當百，不足言也。

translations.literal: With Han troops courage, don firm armor, step stout crossbows, belt sharp swords, one man against hundred, not worth mentioning.
translations.idiomatic: With the courage of Han troops, donning firm armor, stepping with stout crossbows, belting sharp swords—one man can take on a hundred. It is not worth mentioning.

sentences.zh: 夫以韓之勁與大王之賢，乃西面事秦，交臂而服，羞社稷而為天下笑，無大於此者矣。

translations.literal: Using Han strength with great king wisdom, west face serve Qin, cross arms submit, shame state become world laughingstock, none greater than this.
translations.idiomatic: Given Han's strength and Your Majesty's wisdom, to face west and serve Qin, crossing arms in submission, shaming the state and becoming the world's laughingstock—nothing is greater than this shame.

sentences.zh: 是故願大王孰計之。

translations.literal: Therefore wish great king carefully calculate it.
translations.idiomatic: Therefore I wish Your Majesty to carefully calculate this.

translations.literal: Then persuaded Han Xuan Wang: "Han north has Gong, Cheng Gao stronghold, west has Yi Yang, Shang Ban pass, east has Wan, Rang, Wei Water, south has Xiong Mountain, territory nine hundred li square, armored troops several tens of thousands, world strong bows stout crossbows all from Han out. Xi Zi, Shao Fu timely strength, Ju Lai, all shoot six hundred paces outside. Han troops extraordinary feet shoot, hundred shots not pause stop, far ones arrows cover pierce chest, near ones arrowheads hit heart. Han troops swords halberds all from Ming Mountain, Tang Xi, Mo Yang, He Cun, Deng Shi, Wan Ping, Long Yuan, Tai E, all land cut cow horse, water sever swans geese, facing enemy then chop firm armor iron screens, leather pull overturn horses, nothing not completely prepared. With Han troops courage, don firm armor, step stout crossbows, belt sharp swords, one man against hundred, not worth mentioning. Using Han strength with great king wisdom, west face serve Qin, cross arms submit, shame state become world laughingstock, none greater than this. Therefore wish great king carefully calculate it.

sentences.zh: 「大王事秦，秦必求宜陽、成皋。

translations.literal: "Great king serves Qin, Qin certainly seeks Yi Yang, Cheng Gao.
translations.idiomatic: 'If Your Majesty serves Qin, Qin will certainly seek Yiyang and Chenggao.

sentences.zh: 今茲效之，明年又復求割地。

translations.literal: This year cede them, next year again seek divide land.
translations.idiomatic: This year you cede them land, next year they will again seek to divide your territory.

sentences.zh: 與則無地以給之，不與則棄前功而受後禍。

translations.literal: Give then no land to supply, not give then abandon previous merit receive later calamity.
translations.idiomatic: If you give land, you will have no territory left to supply them; if you don't give land, you will abandon your previous achievements and receive later calamities.

sentences.zh: 且大王之地有盡而秦之求無已，以有盡之地而逆無已之求，此所謂市怨結禍者也，不戰而地已削矣。

translations.literal: Moreover great king land has limit but Qin seeking has no end, with limited land oppose endless seeking, this called buying resentment tying calamity, not battle yet land already reduced.
translations.idiomatic: Moreover, Your Majesty's lands have limits but Qin's demands have no end. To oppose endless demands with limited lands—this is what is called buying resentment and tying calamity. Without battle, your lands will already be reduced.

sentences.zh: 臣聞鄙諺曰：『寧為雞口，無為牛後。』

translations.literal: Minister heard proverb: Better chicken mouth than cow rear.
translations.idiomatic: Your minister has heard the proverb: 'Better to be a chicken's head than a cow's rear.'

sentences.zh: 今西面交臂而臣事秦，何異於牛後乎？

translations.literal: Now west face cross arms minister serve Qin, how different from cow rear?
translations.idiomatic: Now to face west, cross arms, and serve Qin as ministers—how is this different from being a cow's rear?

sentences.zh: 夫以大王之賢，挾彊韓之兵，而有牛後之名，臣竊為大王羞之。」

translations.literal: Using great king wisdom, grasp strong Han troops, have cow rear name, minister secretly ashamed for great king."
translations.idiomatic: Given Your Majesty's wisdom and the strong Han troops you command, to have the name of a cow's rear—your minister is secretly ashamed for Your Majesty."

translations.literal: "Great king serves Qin, Qin certainly seeks Yi Yang, Cheng Gao. This year cede them, next year again seek divide land. Give then no land to supply, not give then abandon previous merit receive later calamity. Moreover great king land has limit but Qin seeking has no end, with limited land oppose endless seeking, this called buying resentment tying calamity, not battle yet land already reduced. Minister heard proverb: Better chicken mouth than cow rear. Now west face cross arms minister serve Qin, how different from cow rear? Using great king wisdom, grasp strong Han troops, have cow rear name, minister secretly ashamed for great king."

sentences.zh: 於是韓王勃然作色，攘臂瞋目，按劍仰天太息曰；

translations.literal: Then Han Wang suddenly changed color, rolled sleeves glared eyes, pressed sword faced heaven sighed;
translations.idiomatic: Then the King of Han suddenly changed color, rolled up his sleeves, glared with his eyes, pressed his sword, faced heaven, and sighed deeply, saying:

sentences.zh: 「寡人雖不肖，必不能事秦。

translations.literal: "I though unworthy, certainly cannot serve Qin.
translations.idiomatic: 'Though I am unworthy, I certainly cannot serve Qin.

sentences.zh: 今主君詔以趙王之教，敬奉社稷以從。」

translations.literal: Now master jun summons with Zhao Wang teaching, respectfully offer state to follow."
translations.idiomatic: Now my lord summons me with the teaching of the King of Zhao, and I respectfully offer my state to follow.'

translations.literal: Then Han Wang suddenly changed color, rolled sleeves glared eyes, pressed sword faced heaven sighed; "I though unworthy, certainly cannot serve Qin. Now master jun summons with Zhao Wang teaching, respectfully offer state to follow."

sentences.zh: 又說魏襄王曰：「大王之地，南有鴻溝、陳、汝南、許、郾、昆陽、召陵、舞陽、新都、新郪，東有淮、潁、煑棗、無胥，西有長城之界，北有河外、卷、衍、酸棗，地方千里。

translations.literal: Again persuaded Wei Xiang Wang: "Great king land, south has Hong Gou, Chen, Ru Nan, Xu, Yan, Kun Yang, Zhao Ling, Wu Yang, Xin Du, Xin Ju, east has Huai, Ying, Zhu Zao, Wu Xu, west has Great Wall bounds, north has beyond Yellow River, Juan, Yan, Suan Zao, territory thousand li.
translations.idiomatic: Again he persuaded King Xiang of Wei, saying: 'Your Majesty's lands to the south have Honggou, Chen, Runan, Xu, Yan, Kunyang, Zhaoling, Wuyang, Xindu, and Xinju; to the east they have the Huai, Ying, Zhuzao, and Wuxu; to the west they have the bounds of the Great Wall; to the north they have lands beyond the Yellow River, Juan, Yan, and Suanzhao. The territory spans a thousand li.

sentences.zh: 地名雖小，然而田舍廬廡之數，曾無所芻牧。

translations.literal: Land name though small, however farm houses cottages number, never lack fodder pasturage.
translations.idiomatic: Though the place names are small, the number of farmhouses and cottages never lacks for fodder or pasturage.

sentences.zh: 人民之眾，車馬之多，日夜行不絕，輷輷殷殷，若有三軍之眾。

translations.literal: People multitude, chariots horses many, day night travel not stop, rumbling prosperous, as if three armies multitude.
translations.idiomatic: The multitude of people, the many chariots and horses—their travel day and night never ceases, rumbling and prosperous, as if there were the multitude of three armies.

sentences.zh: 臣竊量大王之國不下楚。

translations.literal: Minister secretly measure great king state not below Chu.
translations.idiomatic: Your minister secretly measures Your Majesty's state as not below Chu.

sentences.zh: 然衡人怵王交彊虎狼之秦以侵天下，卒有秦患，不顧其禍。

translations.literal: Yet balancers frighten wang ally strong tiger wolf Qin to invade world, finally have Qin calamity, not consider their disaster.
translations.idiomatic: Yet the balancers frighten Your Majesty into allying with the strong tiger-wolf Qin to invade the world. In the end they bring Qin calamities without considering their disasters.

sentences.zh: 夫挾彊秦之勢以內劫其主，罪無過此者。

translations.literal: Grasping strong Qin power internally coerce their lord, crime none greater.
translations.idiomatic: To grasp the power of strong Qin and internally coerce their lord—there is no crime greater than this.

sentences.zh: 魏，天下之彊國也；

translations.literal: Wei, world strong state;
translations.idiomatic: Wei is the world's strong state;

sentences.zh: 王，天下之賢王也。

translations.literal: Wang, world worthy wang.
translations.idiomatic: Your Majesty is the world's worthy king.

sentences.zh: 今乃有意西面而事秦，稱東藩，筑帝宮，受冠帶，祠春秋，臣竊為大王恥之。

translations.literal: Now have intention west face serve Qin, call eastern fief, build emperor palace, receive hat belt, sacrifice spring autumn, minister secretly ashamed for great king.
translations.idiomatic: Now you have the intention to face west and serve Qin, call yourself an eastern fief, build an emperor's palace, receive the hat and belt, sacrifice in spring and autumn—your minister is secretly ashamed for Your Majesty.

translations.literal: Again persuaded Wei Xiang Wang: "Great king land, south has Hong Gou, Chen, Ru Nan, Xu, Yan, Kun Yang, Zhao Ling, Wu Yang, Xin Du, Xin Ju, east has Huai, Ying, Zhu Zao, Wu Xu, west has Great Wall bounds, north has beyond Yellow River, Juan, Yan, Suan Zao, territory thousand li. Land name though small, however farm houses cottages number, never lack fodder pasturage. People multitude, chariots horses many, day night travel not stop, rumbling prosperous, as if three armies multitude. Minister secretly measure great king state not below Chu. Yet balancers frighten wang ally strong tiger wolf Qin to invade world, finally have Qin calamity, not consider their disaster. Grasping strong Qin power internally coerce their lord, crime none greater. Wei, world strong state; Wang, world worthy wang. Now have intention west face serve Qin, call eastern fief, build emperor palace, receive hat belt, sacrifice spring autumn, minister secretly ashamed for great king.

sentences.zh: 「臣聞越王句踐戰敝卒三千人，禽夫差於干遂；

translations.literal: "Minister heard Yue Wang Gou Jian battle exhausted troops three thousand, captured Fu Chai at Gan Sui;
translations.idiomatic: 'Your minister has heard that King Goujian of Yue, with battle-worn troops of three thousand, captured Fuchai at Gansui;

sentences.zh: 武王卒三千人，革車三百乘，制紂於牧野：豈其士卒眾哉，誠能奮其威也。

translations.literal: Wu Wang troops three thousand, leather chariots three hundred, controlled Zhou at Mu Ye: was it their soldiers many? Truly could exert their awe.
translations.idiomatic: King Wu, with troops of three thousand and leather chariots of three hundred, controlled Zhou at Muye. Was it that their soldiers were many? Truly they could exert their awe.

sentences.zh: 今竊聞大王之卒，武士二十萬，蒼頭二十萬，奮擊二十萬，廝徒十萬，車六百乘，騎五千匹。

translations.literal: Now secretly hear great king troops, martial soldiers twenty thousand, blue heads twenty thousand, aroused strike twenty thousand, servants ten thousand, chariots six hundred, cavalry five thousand horses.
translations.idiomatic: Now your minister has secretly heard that Your Majesty's troops include two hundred thousand martial soldiers, two hundred thousand blue-heads, two hundred thousand aroused strikers, one hundred thousand servants, six hundred chariots, and five thousand cavalry horses.

sentences.zh: 此其過越王句踐、武王遠矣，今乃聽於群臣之說而欲臣事秦。

translations.literal: This surpasses Yue Wang Gou Jian, Wu Wang far, now listen to ministers words desire minister serve Qin.
translations.idiomatic: This surpasses King Goujian of Yue and King Wu by far. Now you listen to your ministers' words and desire to serve Qin as ministers.

sentences.zh: 夫事秦必割地以效實，故兵未用而國已虧矣。

translations.literal: Serve Qin must divide land cede proof, therefore troops not used yet state already deficient.
translations.idiomatic: To serve Qin, one must divide and cede land as proof. Therefore, before troops are even used, the state is already deficient.

sentences.zh: 凡群臣之言事秦者，皆姦人，非忠臣也。

translations.literal: All ministers words serve Qin, all traitors, not loyal ministers.
translations.idiomatic: All ministers who speak of serving Qin are traitors, not loyal ministers.

sentences.zh: 夫為人臣，割其主之地以求外交，偷取一時之功而不顧其後，破公家而成私門，外挾彊秦之勢以內劫其主，以求割地，願大王孰察之。

translations.literal: Being minister, divide their lord land seek foreign alliance, steal take momentary merit not consider after, break public family establish private gate, externally grasp strong Qin power internally coerce their lord, seek divide land, wish great king carefully examine.
translations.idiomatic: To be a minister and divide their lord's land to seek foreign alliances, stealing momentary merit without considering the aftermath, breaking the public family to establish private gates, externally grasping strong Qin's power to internally coerce their lord, seeking to divide land—I wish Your Majesty to carefully examine this.

translations.literal: "Minister heard Yue Wang Gou Jian battle exhausted troops three thousand, captured Fu Chai at Gan Sui; Wu Wang troops three thousand, leather chariots three hundred, controlled Zhou at Mu Ye: was it their soldiers many? Truly could exert their awe. Now secretly hear great king troops, martial soldiers twenty thousand, blue heads twenty thousand, aroused strike twenty thousand, servants ten thousand, chariots six hundred, cavalry five thousand horses. This surpasses Yue Wang Gou Jian, Wu Wang far, now listen to ministers words desire minister serve Qin. Serve Qin must divide land cede proof, therefore troops not used yet state already deficient. All ministers words serve Qin, all traitors, not loyal ministers. Being minister, divide their lord land seek foreign alliance, steal take momentary merit not consider after, break public family establish private gate, externally grasp strong Qin power internally coerce their lord, seek divide land, wish great king carefully examine.

sentences.zh: 「《周書》曰：『綿綿不絕，蔓蔓柰何？

translations.literal: "Zhou Book says: Continuous not break, creeping what to do?
translations.idiomatic: 'The Zhou Book says: "Continuous without breaking, creeping—what to do?"

sentences.zh: 豪氂不伐，將用斧柯。』

translations.literal: Brambles not cut, will use axe handle.
translations.idiomatic: Brambles not cut, one will use the axe handle.

sentences.zh: 前慮不定，後有大患，將柰之何？

translations.literal: Forward consideration not decided, after have great calamity, what to do?
translations.idiomatic: Forward considerations undecided, later there will be great calamity—what to do?

sentences.zh: 大王誠能聽臣，六國從親，專心并力壹意，則必無彊秦之患。

translations.literal: Great king truly can listen minister, six states form close alliance, devoted together unite intention, then certainly no strong Qin calamity.
translations.idiomatic: If Your Majesty can truly listen to your minister, the six states form a close alliance, devote themselves together and unite their intentions, then there will certainly be no calamity from strong Qin.

sentences.zh: 故敝邑趙王使臣效愚計，奉明約，在大王之詔詔之。」

translations.literal: Therefore humble city Zhao Wang makes minister present foolish plan, offer clear pact, at great king command command it."
translations.idiomatic: Therefore the King of Zhao from my humble city sends your minister to present my foolish plan and offer this clear covenant. It awaits Your Majesty's command."

translations.literal: "Zhou Book says: Continuous not break, creeping what to do? Brambles not cut, will use axe handle. Forward consideration not decided, after have great calamity, what to do? Great king truly can listen minister, six states form close alliance, devoted together unite intention, then certainly no strong Qin calamity. Therefore humble city Zhao Wang makes minister present foolish plan, offer clear pact, at great king command command it."

sentences.zh: 魏王曰：「寡人不肖，未嘗得聞明教。

translations.literal: Wei Wang said: "I unworthy, never obtained clear teaching.
translations.idiomatic: The King of Wei said: 'I am unworthy and have never obtained clear teaching.

sentences.zh: 今主君以趙王之詔詔之，敬以國從。」

translations.literal: Now master jun with Zhao Wang command commands it, respectfully with state follow."
translations.idiomatic: Now my lord commands it with the King of Zhao's decree, and I respectfully follow with my state.'

translations.literal: Wei Wang said: "I unworthy, never obtained clear teaching. Now master jun with Zhao Wang command commands it, respectfully with state follow."

sentences.zh: 因東說齊宣王曰：「齊南有泰山，東有瑯邪，西有清河，北有勃海，北所謂四塞之國也。

translations.literal: Then east persuaded Qi Xuan Wang: Qi south has Tai Mountain, east has Langya, west has Qing River, north has Bo Sea, called four barrier country.
translations.idiomatic: Then he went east and persuaded King Xuan of Qi, saying: 'Qi to the south has Mount Tai, to the east has Langya, to the west has the Qing River, to the north has the Bohai Sea—it is what is called a country of four natural barriers.

sentences.zh: 齊地方二千餘里，帶甲數十萬，粟如丘山。

translations.literal: Qi territory two thousand li square, armored troops several tens of thousands, grain like hill mountains.
translations.idiomatic: Qi's territory spans more than two thousand square li, with several hundred thousand armored troops and grain piled up like hills and mountains.

sentences.zh: 三軍之良，五家之兵，進如鋒矢，戰如雷霆，解如風雨。

translations.literal: Three armies excellent, five families troops, advance like sharp arrow, battle like thunder, disperse like wind rain.
translations.idiomatic: The excellence of its three armies, the troops of its five families—advancing like sharp arrows, battling like thunder, dispersing like wind and rain.

sentences.zh: 即有軍役，未嘗倍泰山，絕清河，涉勃海也。

translations.literal: Even have military service, never double Tai Mountain, cross Qing River, ford Bo Sea.
translations.idiomatic: Even when it has military campaigns, it never has to go over Mount Tai, cross the Qing River, or ford the Bohai Sea.

sentences.zh: 臨菑之中七萬戶，臣竊度之，不下戶三男子，三七二十一萬，不待發於遠縣，而臨菑之卒固已二十一萬矣。

translations.literal: Linzi midst seven thousand households, minister secretly estimates, not below three men per household, three seven twenty one thousand, not need mobilize from distant counties, Linzi troops already twenty one thousand.
translations.idiomatic: In the midst of Linzi there are seventy thousand households. Your minister secretly estimates that there are not fewer than three men per household—three times seven is twenty-one thousand. Without needing to mobilize from distant counties, the troops of Linzi alone are already two hundred ten thousand.

sentences.zh: 臨菑甚富而實，其民無不吹竽鼓瑟，彈琴擊筑，鬬雞走狗，六博蹋鞠者。

translations.literal: Linzi very rich substantial, its people none not blow reed flute drum se, pluck qin strike zhu, cockfight dog racing, liubo kickball.
translations.idiomatic: Linzi is very rich and substantial. Its people are all engaged in blowing reed pipes and drumming se strings, plucking qins and striking zhuz, cockfighting and dog racing, liubo games and kickball.

sentences.zh: 臨菑之涂，車轂擊，人肩摩，連衽成帷，舉袂成幕，揮汗成雨，家殷人足，志高氣揚。

translations.literal: Linzi roads, chariot hubs strike, people shoulders rub, connected hems form curtain, raise sleeves form tent, wave sweat form rain, families prosperous people full, ambitions high spirits proud.
translations.idiomatic: On Linzi's roads, chariot hubs strike together, people's shoulders rub against each other. Connected hems form curtains, raised sleeves form tents, waved sweat forms rain. Families are prosperous and people are full, ambitions are high and spirits proud.

sentences.zh: 夫以大王之賢與齊之彊，天下莫能當。

translations.literal: Using great king wisdom with Qi strength, world none can match.
translations.idiomatic: Given Your Majesty's wisdom and Qi's strength, none in the world can match it.

sentences.zh: 今乃西面而事秦，臣竊為大王羞之。

translations.literal: Now west face serve Qin, minister secretly ashamed for great king.
translations.idiomatic: Now you face west and serve Qin—your minister is secretly ashamed for Your Majesty.

translations.literal: Then east persuaded Qi Xuan Wang: Qi south has Tai Mountain, east has Langya, west has Qing River, north has Bo Sea, called four barrier country. Qi territory two thousand li square, armored troops several tens of thousands, grain like hill mountains. Three armies excellent, five families troops, advance like sharp arrow, battle like thunder, disperse like wind rain. Even have military service, never double Tai Mountain, cross Qing River, ford Bo Sea. Linzi midst seven thousand households, minister secretly estimates, not below three men per household, three seven twenty one thousand, not need mobilize from distant counties, Linzi troops already twenty one thousand. Linzi very rich substantial, its people none not blow reed flute drum se, pluck qin strike zhu, cockfight dog racing, liubo kickball. Linzi roads, chariot hubs strike, people shoulders rub, connected hems form curtain, raise sleeves form tent, wave sweat form rain, families prosperous people full, ambitions high spirits proud. Using great king wisdom with Qi strength, world none can match. Now west face serve Qin, minister secretly ashamed for great king.

sentences.zh: 「且夫韓、魏之所以重畏秦者，為與秦接境壤界也。

translations.literal: Moreover Han Wei reason heavily fear Qin, because border Qin territory.
translations.idiomatic: 'Moreover, the reason Han and Wei heavily fear Qin is that they border Qin's territory.

sentences.zh: 兵出而相當，不出十日而戰勝存亡之機決矣。

translations.literal: Troops emerge confront, not ten days victory defeat survival extinction decided.
translations.idiomatic: Troops emerge and confront each other, and within ten days the mechanisms of victory, defeat, survival, and extinction are decided.

sentences.zh: 韓、魏戰而勝秦，則兵半折，四境不守；

translations.literal: Han Wei battle win Qin, then troops half destroyed, four borders not defended;
translations.idiomatic: If Han and Wei battle and defeat Qin, then half their troops will be destroyed and their four borders will not be defended;

sentences.zh: 戰而不勝，則國已危亡隨其後。

translations.literal: Battle not win, then state already dangerous extinction follows.
translations.idiomatic: If they battle but do not win, then the state's danger and extinction will follow.

sentences.zh: 是故韓、魏之所以重與秦戰，而輕為之臣也。

translations.literal: Therefore Han Wei heavily battle Qin, lightly become ministers.
translations.idiomatic: Therefore Han and Wei heavily battle Qin while lightly becoming ministers.

sentences.zh: 今秦之攻齊則不然。

translations.literal: Now Qin attack Qi then not so.
translations.idiomatic: Now Qin's attack on Qi is not so.

sentences.zh: 倍韓、魏之地，過衛陽晉之道，徑乎亢父之險，車不得方軌，騎不得比行，百人守險，千人不敢過也。

translations.literal: Doubled Han Wei land, pass Wei Yang Jin road, through Kang Fu danger, chariots cannot parallel tracks, cavalry cannot side by side, hundred men guard danger, thousand dare not pass.
translations.idiomatic: It doubles through Han and Wei lands, passes the roads of Wei, Yangjin, goes directly through the dangers of Kangfu. Chariots cannot travel parallel tracks, cavalry cannot ride side by side. If a hundred men guard the dangers, a thousand dare not pass.

sentences.zh: 秦雖欲深入，則狼顧，恐韓、魏之議其後也。

translations.literal: Qin though wish deep enter, then wolf look back, fear Han Wei discuss rear.
translations.idiomatic: Though Qin wishes to penetrate deeply, it will look back like a wolf, fearing that Han and Wei will attack its rear.

sentences.zh: 是故恫疑虛猲，驕矜而不敢進，則秦之不能害齊亦明矣。

translations.literal: Therefore frightened doubtful empty threat, arrogant not dare advance, then Qin cannot harm Qi also clear.
translations.idiomatic: Therefore frightened and doubtful, making empty threats, arrogant and not daring to advance—then that Qin cannot harm Qi is also abundantly clear.

translations.literal: Moreover Han Wei reason heavily fear Qin, because border Qin territory. Troops emerge confront, not ten days victory defeat survival extinction decided. Han Wei battle win Qin, then troops half destroyed, four borders not defended; Battle not win, then state already dangerous extinction follows. Therefore Han Wei heavily battle Qin, lightly become ministers. Now Qin attack Qi then not so. Doubled Han Wei land, pass Wei Yang Jin road, through Kang Fu danger, chariots cannot parallel tracks, cavalry cannot side by side, hundred men guard danger, thousand dare not pass. Qin though wish deep enter, then wolf look back, fear Han Wei discuss rear. Therefore frightened doubtful empty threat, arrogant not dare advance, then Qin cannot harm Qi also clear.

sentences.zh: 「夫不深料秦之無柰齊何，而欲西面而事之，是群臣之計過也。

translations.literal: Not deeply calculate Qin what to do Qi, desire west face serve it, this ministers plan wrong.
translations.idiomatic: 'Not deeply calculating that Qin can do nothing to Qi, yet desiring to face west and serve it—this is the ministers' plan being wrong.

sentences.zh: 今無臣事秦之名而有彊國之實，臣是故願大王少留意計之。」

translations.literal: Now no minister serve Qin name have strong state reality, minister therefore wish great king little attention calculate it.
translations.idiomatic: Now without the name of ministering to Qin but having the reality of a strong state, your minister therefore wishes Your Majesty to pay a little attention and calculate this.'

translations.literal: Not deeply calculate Qin what to do Qi, desire west face serve it, this ministers plan wrong. Now no minister serve Qin name have strong state reality, minister therefore wish great king little attention calculate it.

sentences.zh: 齊王曰：「寡人不敏，僻遠守海，窮道東境之國也，未嘗得聞餘教。

translations.literal: Qi Wang said: I not intelligent, remote defend sea, poor road east border country, never obtained remaining teaching.
translations.idiomatic: The King of Qi said: 'I am not intelligent, remote and defending the sea, a country of poor roads on the eastern border. I have never obtained your remaining teachings.

sentences.zh: 今足下以趙王詔詔之，敬以國從。」

translations.literal: Now your excellency with Zhao Wang command commands it, respectfully with state follow.
translations.idiomatic: Now Your Excellency commands it with the King of Zhao's decree, and I respectfully follow with my state.'

translations.literal: Qi Wang said: I not intelligent, remote defend sea, poor road east border country, never obtained remaining teaching. Now your excellency with Zhao Wang command commands it, respectfully with state follow.

sentences.zh: 乃西南說楚威王曰：「楚，天下之彊國也；

translations.literal: Then southwest persuaded Chu Wei Wang: Chu, world strong state;
translations.idiomatic: Then he went southwest and persuaded King Wei of Chu, saying: 'Chu is the world's strong state;

sentences.zh: 王，天下之賢王也。

translations.literal: Wang, world worthy wang.
translations.idiomatic: Your Majesty is the world's worthy king.

sentences.zh: 西有黔中、巫郡，東有夏州、海陽，南有洞庭、蒼梧，北有陘塞、郇陽，地方五千餘里，帶甲百萬，車千乘，騎萬匹，粟支十年。

translations.literal: West has Qian Zhong, Wu commandery, east has Xia Zhou, Hai Yang, south has Dong Ting, Cang Wu, north has Xiong pass, Xun Yang, territory five thousand li square, armored hundred thousand, chariots thousand, cavalry ten thousand horses, grain sufficient ten years.
translations.idiomatic: To the west it has Qianzhong and Wu Commandery, to the east Xiazhou and Haiyang, to the south Dongting and Cangwu, to the north Xiong Pass and Xunyang. Its territory spans more than five thousand square li, with a hundred thousand armored troops, a thousand chariots, ten thousand cavalry horses, and grain sufficient for ten years.

sentences.zh: 此霸王之資也。

translations.literal: This is the stuff of which hegemon-kings are made.
translations.idiomatic: This is the stuff of which hegemon-kings are made.

sentences.zh: 夫以楚之彊與王之賢，天下莫能當也。

translations.literal: Using Chu strength with wang wisdom, world none can match.
translations.idiomatic: Given Chu's strength and Your Majesty's wisdom, none in the world can match it.

sentences.zh: 今乃欲西面而事秦，則諸侯莫不西面而朝於章臺之下矣。

translations.literal: Now desire west face serve Qin, then feudal lords none not west face court at Zhang Tai below.
translations.idiomatic: Now if you desire to face west and serve Qin, then the feudal lords will all face west and court at the base of Zhangtai.

translations.literal: Then southwest persuaded Chu Wei Wang: Chu, world strong state; Wang, world worthy wang. West has Qian Zhong, Wu commandery, east has Xia Zhou, Hai Yang, south has Dong Ting, Cang Wu, north has Xiong pass, Xun Yang, territory five thousand li square, armored hundred thousand, chariots thousand, cavalry ten thousand horses, grain sufficient ten years. This hegemon wang resources. Using Chu strength with wang wisdom, world none can match. Now desire west face serve Qin, then feudal lords none not west face court at Zhang Tai below.

sentences.zh: 「秦之所害莫如楚，楚彊則秦弱，秦彊則楚弱，其勢不兩立。

translations.literal: Qin harmed none like Chu, Chu strong then Qin weak, Qin strong then Chu weak, their power not coexist.
translations.idiomatic: 'None whom Qin harms compares to Chu. If Chu is strong, then Qin is weak; if Qin is strong, then Chu is weak. Their power cannot coexist.

sentences.zh: 故為大王計，莫如從親以孤秦。

translations.literal: Therefore for great wang planning, none better than form close alliance isolate Qin.
translations.idiomatic: Therefore in planning for Your Majesty, nothing is better than forming a close alliance to isolate Qin.

sentences.zh: 大王不從［親］，秦必起兩軍，一軍出武關，一軍下黔中，則鄢郢動矣。

translations.literal: Great wang not form close alliance, Qin certainly raise two armies, one army emerge Wu Pass, one army descend Qian Zhong, then Yan Ying move.
translations.idiomatic: If Your Majesty does not form a close alliance, Qin will certainly raise two armies—one army emerging from Wu Pass, one army descending through Qianzhong—then Yan and Ying will be shaken.

translations.literal: Qin harmed none like Chu, Chu strong then Qin weak, Qin strong then Chu weak, their power not coexist. Therefore for great wang planning, none better than form close alliance isolate Qin. Great wang not form close alliance, Qin certainly raise two armies, one army emerge Wu Pass, one army descend Qian Zhong, then Yan Ying move.

sentences.zh: 「臣聞治之其未亂也，為之其未有也。

translations.literal: Minister heard govern when not yet chaotic, prepare when not yet have.
translations.idiomatic: 'Your minister has heard: govern when not yet chaotic, prepare when not yet existent.

sentences.zh: 患至而後憂之，則無及已。

translations.literal: Calamity arrive then worry, then no time.
translations.idiomatic: Worry about calamity only after it arrives, then there is no time.

sentences.zh: 故願大王蚤孰計之。

translations.literal: Therefore wish great wang early carefully calculate.
translations.idiomatic: Therefore I wish Your Majesty to calculate this early and carefully.

translations.literal: Minister heard govern when not yet chaotic, prepare when not yet have. Calamity arrive then worry, then no time. Therefore wish great wang early carefully calculate.

sentences.zh: 「大王誠能聽臣，臣請令山東之國奉四時之獻，以承大王之明詔，委社稷，奉宗廟，練士厲兵，在大王之所用之。

translations.literal: Great wang truly can listen minister, minister please make Shandong states offer four seasons tribute, to receive great wang clear command, entrust state altars, maintain ancestral temples, train soldiers temper troops, at great wang use them.
translations.idiomatic: 'If Your Majesty can truly listen to your minister, your minister will make the Shandong states offer the tributes of the four seasons to receive Your Majesty's clear commands, entrust their state altars, maintain their ancestral temples, train their soldiers and temper their troops, to be used at Your Majesty's discretion.

sentences.zh: 大王誠能用臣之愚計，則韓、魏、齊、燕、趙、衛之妙音美人必充後宮，燕、代橐駝良馬必實外廄。

translations.literal: Great wang truly can use minister foolish plan, then Han Wei Qi Yan Zhao Wei wonderful music beauties must fill rear palace, Yan Dai camels good horses must fill outer stables.
translations.idiomatic: If Your Majesty can truly use your minister's foolish plan, then the wonderful musicians and beauties of Han, Wei, Qi, Yan, Zhao, and Wei will certainly fill the rear palace, and the camels and good horses of Yan and Dai will certainly fill the outer stables.

sentences.zh: 故從合則楚王，衡成則秦帝。

translations.literal: Therefore alliance then Chu wang, balance succeed then Qin emperor.
translations.idiomatic: Therefore if the alliance is formed, then Chu becomes king; if the balance succeeds, then Qin becomes emperor.

sentences.zh: 今釋霸王之業，而有事人之名，臣竊為大王不取也。

translations.literal: Now abandon hegemon wang enterprise, have serve people name, minister secretly not take for great wang.
translations.idiomatic: Now to abandon the enterprise of becoming hegemon and king, while having the name of serving people—your minister secretly does not approve for Your Majesty.

Therefore alliance then Chu wang, balance succeed then Qin emperor. Now abandon hegemon wang enterprise, have serve people name, minister secretly not take for great wang.

sentences.zh: 「夫秦，虎狼之國也，有吞天下之心。

translations.literal: Qin, tiger wolf state, has swallow world heart.
translations.idiomatic: 'Qin is a state of tigers and wolves, with the heart to swallow the world.

sentences.zh: 秦，天下之仇讎也。

translations.literal: Qin, world enemy.
translations.idiomatic: Qin is the enemy of the world.

sentences.zh: 衡人皆欲割諸侯之地以事秦，此所謂養仇而奉讎者也。

translations.literal: Balancers all desire divide feudal lords land serve Qin, this called nourish enemy serve foe.
translations.idiomatic: Balancers all desire to divide the feudal lords' lands to serve Qin—this is what is called nourishing the enemy and serving the foe.

sentences.zh: 夫為人臣，割其主之地以外交彊虎狼之秦，以侵天下，卒有秦患，不顧其禍。

translations.literal: Being minister, divide their lord land external ally strong tiger wolf Qin, invade world, finally have Qin calamity, not consider disaster.
translations.idiomatic: To be a minister and divide their lord's land to externally ally with the strong tiger-wolf Qin, invading the world, and finally bring Qin calamities without considering the disaster.

sentences.zh: 夫外挾彊秦之威以內劫其主，以求割地，大逆不忠，無過此者。

translations.literal: Externally grasp strong Qin awe internally coerce lord, seek divide land, great rebellion not loyal, none greater.
translations.idiomatic: To externally grasp the awe of strong Qin and internally coerce their lord, seeking to divide lands—great rebellion and disloyalty, none is greater than this.

sentences.zh: 故從親則諸侯割地以事楚，衡合則楚割地以事秦，此兩策者相去遠矣，二者大王何居焉？

translations.literal: Therefore alliance then feudal lords divide land serve Chu, balance unite then Chu divide land serve Qin, these two strategies far apart, two which great wang choose?
translations.idiomatic: Therefore if you form an alliance, the feudal lords will divide lands to serve Chu; if you unite in balance, Chu will divide lands to serve Qin. These two strategies are far apart—which of the two does Your Majesty choose?

sentences.zh: 故敝邑趙王使臣效愚計，奉明約，在大王詔之。」

translations.literal: Therefore humble city Zhao Wang makes minister present foolish plan, offer clear pact, at great wang command.
translations.idiomatic: Therefore the King of Zhao from my humble city sends your minister to present my foolish plan and offer this clear covenant. It awaits Your Majesty's command."

sentences.zh: 楚王曰：「寡人之國西與秦接境，秦有舉巴蜀并漢中之心。

translations.literal: Chu Wang said: My state west borders Qin, Qin has raise Ba Shu annex Han Zhong heart.
translations.idiomatic: The King of Chu said: 'My state to the west borders Qin, and Qin has the heart to raise Ba and Shu and annex Hanzhong.

sentences.zh: 秦，虎狼之國，不可親也。

translations.literal: Qin, tiger wolf state, cannot befriend.
translations.idiomatic: Qin is a state of tigers and wolves, and cannot be befriended.

sentences.zh: 而韓、魏迫於秦患，不可與深謀，與深謀恐反人以入於秦，故謀未發而國已危矣。

translations.literal: Han Wei pressed by Qin calamity, cannot deep plan with, deep plan fear rebel people enter Qin, therefore plan not issue yet state already dangerous.
translations.idiomatic: Han and Wei are pressed by Qin's calamities and cannot make deep plans with us. To make deep plans with them would fear that people rebel and enter Qin. Therefore, before plans are even issued, the state is already in danger.

sentences.zh: 寡人自料以楚當秦，不見勝也；

translations.literal: I self calculate with Chu match Qin, not see victory;
translations.idiomatic: I calculate for myself that with Chu matching Qin, I do not see victory;

sentences.zh: 內與群臣謀，不足恃也。

translations.literal: Internal with ministers plan, not sufficient rely.
translations.idiomatic: To plan internally with my ministers is not sufficient to rely on.

sentences.zh: 寡人臥不安席，食不甘味，心搖搖然如縣旌而無所終薄。

translations.literal: I lie not peaceful mat, eat not sweet taste, heart shake shake like hanging banner without end settle.
translations.idiomatic: I lie uneasily on my mat, my food lacks sweetness. My heart shakes like a hanging banner and finds no place to settle.

sentences.zh: 今主君欲一天下，收諸侯，存危國，寡人謹奉社稷以從。」

translations.literal: Now master jun wish unite world, gather feudal lords, preserve dangerous state, I respectfully offer state to follow.
translations.idiomatic: Now my lord wishes to unite the world, gather the feudal lords, and preserve endangered states. I respectfully offer my state to follow.'
