sentences.zh: 於是六國從合而并力焉。

translations.literal: Then six states form alliance unite strength.
translations.idiomatic: Then the six states formed an alliance and united their strength.

sentences.zh: 蘇秦為從約長，并相六國。

translations.literal: Su Qin as alliance pact chief, concurrently chancellor six states.
translations.idiomatic: Su Qin became the chief of the alliance pact and concurrently served as chancellor of the six states.

translations.literal: Then six states form alliance unite strength. Su Qin as alliance pact chief, concurrently chancellor six states.

sentences.zh: 北報趙王，乃行過雒陽，車騎輜重，諸侯各發使送之甚眾，疑於王者。

translations.literal: North report Zhao wang, then pass Luoyang, chariots cavalry baggage, feudal lords each send envoys send very many, suspect like wang.
translations.idiomatic: He reported north to the King of Zhao, then passed through Luoyang with chariots, cavalry, and baggage. The feudal lords each sent envoys to send him off in great numbers, resembling a king.

sentences.zh: 周顯王聞之恐懼，除道，使人郊勞。

translations.literal: Zhou Xian Wang heard fear, clear road, send person suburban welcome.
translations.idiomatic: King Xian of Zhou heard of it and was fearful. He cleared the roads and sent people to welcome him in the suburbs.

sentences.zh: 蘇秦之昆弟妻嫂側目不敢仰視，俯伏侍取食。

translations.literal: Su Qin brothers wife sisters-in-law sidelong eyes dare not look up, bow serve take food.
translations.idiomatic: Su Qin's brothers, wife, and sisters-in-law glanced sidelong and dared not look up. They bowed low and served him food.

sentences.zh: 蘇秦笑謂其嫂曰：「何前倨而後恭也？」

translations.literal: Su Qin laugh tell his sister-in-law: What before arrogant after respectful?
translations.idiomatic: Su Qin laughed and said to his sister-in-law: 'Why were you arrogant before but respectful now?'

sentences.zh: 嫂委蛇蒲服，以面掩地而謝曰：「見季子位高金多也。」

translations.literal: Sister-in-law crawl kneel, with face cover ground apologize: See Ji Zi position high gold many.
translations.idiomatic: His sister-in-law crawled and knelt, covering her face with the ground as she apologized: 'I see that Ji Zi has a high position and much gold.'

sentences.zh: 蘇秦喟然嘆曰：「此一人之身，富貴則親戚畏懼之，貧賤則輕易之，況眾人乎！

translations.literal: Su Qin sigh: This one person body, rich noble then relatives fear it, poor humble then despise it, moreover crowd!
translations.idiomatic: Su Qin sighed deeply and said: 'This single person—when rich and noble, relatives fear him; when poor and humble, they despise him. How much more so with the crowd!'

sentences.zh: 且使我有雒陽負郭田二頃，吾豈能佩六國相印乎！」

translations.literal: Moreover make I have Luoyang suburb field two qing, I how can wear six states chancellor seal!
translations.idiomatic: 'Moreover, if I had two qing of suburban fields in Luoyang, how could I wear the chancellor seals of the six states!'

sentences.zh: 於是散千金以賜宗族朋友。

translations.literal: Then scatter thousand jin reward clan relatives friends.
translations.idiomatic: Then he scattered a thousand jin to reward his clan relatives and friends.

sentences.zh: 初，蘇秦之燕，貸人百錢為資，乃得富貴，以百金償之。

translations.literal: Initially, Su Qin go Yan, borrow person hundred cash as capital, then obtain rich noble, with hundred jin repay.
translations.idiomatic: Initially, when Su Qin went to Yan, he borrowed a hundred cash as capital. Then he obtained wealth and nobility, and repaid with a hundred jin.

sentences.zh: 遍報諸所嘗見德者。

translations.literal: Comprehensively repay all once seen kindness.
translations.idiomatic: He comprehensively repaid all those who had once shown him kindness.

sentences.zh: 其從者有一人獨未得報，乃前自言。

translations.literal: His followers have one person alone not get repay, then advance self speak.
translations.idiomatic: Among his followers, there was one person who alone had not received repayment. He then came forward and spoke for himself.

sentences.zh: 蘇秦曰：「我非忘子。

translations.literal: Su Qin said: I not forget you.
translations.idiomatic: Su Qin said: 'I have not forgotten you.

sentences.zh: 子之與我至燕，再三欲去我易水之上，方是時，我困，故望子深，是以後子。

translations.literal: You with I go Yan, again three wish leave I Yi Water above, just that time, I distressed, therefore hope you deep, is therefore late you.
translations.idiomatic: You came with me to Yan and repeatedly wanted to leave me above the Yi River. At that time, I was distressed, so I hoped deeply in you, which is why I repaid you late.

sentences.zh: 子今亦得矣。」

translations.literal: You now also obtain.
translations.idiomatic: You now also obtain.'

translations.literal: Su Qin already pact six states form alliance, return Zhao, Zhao Su Hou enfeoff as Wu An Jun, then throw alliance pact book at Qin.
translations.idiomatic: After Su Qin had made the pact of the six states to form an alliance, he returned to Zhao. King Su of Zhao enfeoffed him as Lord Wu'an, then threw the alliance pact document at Qin.

sentences.zh: 秦兵不敢闚函谷關十五年。

translations.literal: Qin troops dare not spy Hangu Pass fifteen years.
translations.idiomatic: Qin troops dared not spy on Hangu Pass for fifteen years.

sentences.zh: 其後秦使犀首欺齊、魏，與共伐趙，欲敗從約。

translations.literal: Afterward Qin make Xi Shou deceive Qi Wei, with together attack Zhao, wish break alliance pact.
translations.idiomatic: Afterward, Qin sent Xi Shou to deceive Qi and Wei, and together with them attacked Zhao, desiring to break the alliance pact.

sentences.zh: 齊、魏伐趙，趙王讓蘇秦。

translations.literal: Qi Wei attack Zhao, Zhao Wang blame Su Qin.
translations.idiomatic: Qi and Wei attacked Zhao, and the King of Zhao blamed Su Qin.

sentences.zh: 蘇秦恐，請使燕，必報齊。

translations.literal: Su Qin fear, request envoy Yan, must repay Qi.
translations.idiomatic: Su Qin was fearful and requested to be sent as envoy to Yan, saying he must repay Qi.

sentences.zh: 蘇秦去趙而從約皆解。

translations.literal: Su Qin leave Zhao alliance all dissolve.
translations.idiomatic: When Su Qin left Zhao, all the alliance pacts dissolved.

translations.literal: Afterward Qin make Xi Shou deceive Qi Wei, with together attack Zhao, wish break alliance pact. Qi Wei attack Zhao, Zhao Wang blame Su Qin. Su Qin fear, request envoy Yan, must repay Qi. Su Qin leave Zhao alliance all dissolve.

sentences.zh: 秦惠王以其女為燕太子婦。

translations.literal: Qin Hui Wang with his daughter as Yan crown prince wife.
translations.idiomatic: King Hui of Qin gave his daughter as wife to the Yan crown prince.

sentences.zh: 是歲，文侯卒，太子立，是為燕易王。

translations.literal: This year, Wen Hou die, crown prince establish, this Yan Yi Wang.
translations.idiomatic: This year, Marquis Wen died. The crown prince was established, and this was King Yi of Yan.

sentences.zh: 易王初立，齊宣王因燕喪伐燕，取十城。

translations.literal: Yi Wang initial establish, Qi Xuan Wang take advantage Yan mourning attack Yan, take ten cities.
translations.idiomatic: When King Yi was newly established, King Xuan of Qi took advantage of Yan's mourning to attack Yan and took ten cities.

sentences.zh: 易王謂蘇秦曰：「往日先生至燕，而先王資先生見趙，遂約六國從。

translations.literal: Yi Wang tell Su Qin: Former day mister to Yan, former wang fund mister see Zhao, then pact six states alliance.
translations.idiomatic: King Yi said to Su Qin: 'In former days, when you came to Yan, the former king funded you to see Zhao, and thus you made the pact of the six states to ally.'

sentences.zh: 今齊先伐趙，次至燕，以先生之故為天下笑，先生能為燕得侵地乎？」

translations.literal: Now Qi first attack Zhao, next to Yan, because mister reason become world laugh, mister can for Yan obtain invaded land?
translations.idiomatic: Now Qi first attacked Zhao, then came to Yan, and because of you, sir, has become the world's laughingstock. Can you obtain the invaded lands back for Yan?'

sentences.zh: 蘇秦大慚，曰：「請為王取之。」

translations.literal: Su Qin greatly ashamed, said: Please for wang take it.
translations.idiomatic: Su Qin was greatly ashamed and said: 'Please allow me to take it back for Your Majesty.'

sentences.zh: 蘇秦見齊王，再拜，俯而慶，仰而弔。

translations.literal: Su Qin see Qi Wang, twice bow, bend celebrate, raise condole.
translations.idiomatic: Su Qin saw the King of Qi, bowed twice, bent low to congratulate, raised up to condole.

sentences.zh: 齊王曰：「是何慶弔相隨之速也？」

translations.literal: Qi Wang said: This what celebrate condole follow so quick?
translations.idiomatic: The King of Qi said: 'What is this of congratulations and condolences following so quickly?'

sentences.zh: 蘇秦曰：「臣聞饑人所以饑而不食烏喙者，為其愈充腹而與餓死同患也。

translations.literal: Su Qin said: Subject heard hungry person so hungry not eat crow beak, because fill stomach but with starve die same calamity.
translations.idiomatic: Su Qin said: 'Your minister has heard that a hungry person remains hungry and does not eat crow's beak poison because though it fills the stomach, it is the same calamity as starving to death.'

sentences.zh: 今燕雖弱小，即秦王之少婿也。

translations.literal: Now Yan though weak small, is Qin Wang young son-in-law.
translations.idiomatic: Now Yan, though weak and small, is the young son-in-law of the King of Qin.

sentences.zh: 大王利其十城而長與彊秦為仇。

translations.literal: Great wang profit its ten cities long with strong Qin enemy.
translations.idiomatic: Your Majesty profits from its ten cities while being a long-term enemy of strong Qin.

sentences.zh: 今使弱燕為鴈行而彊秦敝其後，以招天下之精兵，是食烏喙之類也。」

translations.literal: Now make weak Yan as goose row strong Qin exhaust its rear, to attract world elite troops, this eat crow beak class.
translations.idiomatic: Now to make weak Yan the vanguard like a goose formation while strong Qin exhausts its rear, thereby attracting the world's elite troops—this is of the same class as eating crow's beak poison.'

sentences.zh: 齊王愀然變色曰：「然則柰何？」

translations.literal: Qi Wang worried change color: Then what to do?
translations.idiomatic: The King of Qi was worried and changed color, saying: 'Then what should be done?'

sentences.zh: 蘇秦曰：「臣聞古之善制事者，轉禍為福，因敗為功。

translations.literal: Su Qin said: Subject heard ancient good control affairs, turn calamity to fortune, because defeat become merit.
translations.idiomatic: Su Qin said: 'Your minister has heard that the ancients who were good at managing affairs turned calamity into fortune and used defeat to achieve merit.

sentences.zh: 大王誠能聽臣計，即歸燕之十城。

translations.literal: Great wang truly can listen minister plan, then return Yan ten cities.
translations.idiomatic: If Your Majesty can truly listen to your minister's plan, then return Yan's ten cities.

sentences.zh: 燕無故而得十城，必喜；

translations.literal: Yan without reason obtain ten cities, certainly happy;
translations.idiomatic: Yan will obtain ten cities without reason and will certainly be happy;

sentences.zh: 秦王知以己之故而歸燕之十城，亦必喜。

translations.literal: Qin Wang know with self reason return Yan ten cities, also certainly happy.
translations.idiomatic: The King of Qin will know that Yan's ten cities were returned because of him and will also certainly be happy.

sentences.zh: 此所謂棄仇讎而得石交者也。

translations.literal: This called abandon enemy obtain stone friendship.
translations.idiomatic: This is what is called abandoning an enemy and obtaining a friendship as solid as stone.

sentences.zh: 夫燕、秦俱事齊，則大王號令天下，莫敢不聽。

translations.literal: Yan Qin both serve Qi, then great wang command world, none dare not listen.
translations.idiomatic: If Yan and Qin both serve Qi, then Your Majesty's commands to the world will be such that none dare not listen.

sentences.zh: 是王以虛辭附秦，以十城取天下。

translations.literal: This wang with empty words attach Qin, with ten cities take world.
translations.idiomatic: This is Your Majesty attaching Qin with empty words and taking the world with ten cities.

translations.idiomatic: The king said: 'Good.'

translations.literal: Person have slander Su Qin: Left right sell country treacherous minister, will make rebellion.
translations.idiomatic: There were those who slandered Su Qin, saying: 'He is a treacherous minister who sells out his country and turns back on his word. He will make rebellion.'

sentences.zh: 蘇秦恐得罪歸，而燕王不復官也。

translations.literal: Su Qin fear get crime return, Yan Wang not restore office.
translations.idiomatic: Su Qin feared that he would return having committed a crime, and the King of Yan would not restore his office.

sentences.zh: 蘇秦見燕王曰：「臣，東周之鄙人也，無有分寸之功，而王親拜之於廟而禮之於廷。

translations.literal: Su Qin see Yan Wang said: Subject, Dong Zhou lowly person, no inch merit, wang personally bow at temple ritual at court.
translations.idiomatic: Su Qin saw the King of Yan and said: 'Your subject is a lowly person from Eastern Zhou, without an inch of merit, yet Your Majesty personally bowed to him at the temple and ritualized him at court.

sentences.zh: 今臣為王卻齊之兵而［攻］得十城，宜以益親。

translations.literal: Now subject for wang repel Qi troops obtain ten cities, should increase close.
translations.idiomatic: Now your subject has repelled Qi's troops for Your Majesty and obtained ten cities. It should increase our closeness.

sentences.zh: 今來而王不官臣者，人必有以不信傷臣於王者。

translations.literal: Now come wang not office subject, person must have use disbelief injure subject to wang.
translations.idiomatic: Now I come and Your Majesty does not office me, there must be those who use disbelief to injure your subject to Your Majesty.

sentences.zh: 臣之不信，王之福也。

translations.literal: Subject disbelief, wang blessing.
translations.idiomatic: Your subject's lack of faith is Your Majesty's blessing.

sentences.zh: 臣聞忠信者，所以自為也；

translations.literal: Subject heard loyal faithful, so self do;
translations.idiomatic: Your minister has heard that loyalty and faith are done for oneself;

sentences.zh: 進取者，所以為人也。

translations.literal: Advance take, so for others.
translations.idiomatic: advancing and taking is done for others.

sentences.zh: 且臣之說齊王，曾非欺之也。

translations.literal: Moreover subject advise Qi Wang, ever not deceive it.
translations.idiomatic: Moreover, your minister's persuasion of the King of Qi has never been to deceive him.

sentences.zh: 臣棄老母於東周，固去自為而行進取也。

translations.literal: Subject abandon old mother Dong Zhou, certainly go self do advance take.
translations.idiomatic: Your minister abandoned his old mother in Eastern Zhou and certainly left to do for himself and pursue advancement.

sentences.zh: 今有孝如曾參，廉如伯夷，信如尾生。

translations.literal: Now have filial like Zeng Shen, clean like Bo Yi, faithful like Wei Sheng.
translations.idiomatic: Now suppose there were those as filial as Zeng Shen, as clean as Bo Yi, as faithful as Wei Sheng.

sentences.zh: 得此三人者以事大王，何若？」

translations.literal: Obtain these three to serve great wang, how?
translations.idiomatic: If you obtained these three to serve Your Majesty, how would that be?'

sentences.zh: 王曰：「足矣。」

translations.literal: Wang said: Sufficient.
translations.idiomatic: The king said: 'That would be sufficient.'

sentences.zh: 蘇秦曰：「孝如曾參，義不離其親一宿於外，王又安能使之步行千里而事弱燕之危王哉？

translations.literal: Su Qin said: Filial like Zeng Shen, righteousness not leave relatives one night outside, wang again how make step walk thousand li serve weak Yan danger wang?
translations.idiomatic: Su Qin said: 'One as filial as Zeng Shen, whose righteousness does not allow him to leave his parents one night outside—how could Your Majesty make him walk a thousand li to serve the endangered king of weak Yan?'

sentences.zh: 廉如伯夷，義不為孤竹君之嗣，不肯為武王臣，不受封侯而餓死首陽山下。

translations.literal: Clean like Bo Yi, righteousness not for Gu Zhu jun heir, not willing Wu Wang minister, not accept enfeoff marquise starve die Shou Yang mountain.
translations.idiomatic: One as clean as Bo Yi, whose righteousness did not allow him to become heir to the Lord of Guzhu, would not serve as minister to King Wu, would not accept enfeoffment as marquise and starved to death below Shouyang Mountain.

sentences.zh: 有廉如此，王又安能使之步行千里而行進取於齊哉？

translations.literal: Have clean thus, wang again how make step walk thousand li advance take Qi?
translations.idiomatic: One so clean—how could Your Majesty make him walk a thousand li to pursue advancement in Qi?

sentences.zh: 信如尾生，與女子期於梁下，女子不來，水至不去，抱柱而死。

translations.literal: Faithful like Wei Sheng, with woman period at bridge, woman not come, water arrive not go, embrace pillar die.
translations.idiomatic: One as faithful as Wei Sheng, who made an appointment with a woman beneath a bridge, and when the woman did not come, water arrived but he did not leave, embracing the pillar and dying.

sentences.zh: 有信如此，王又安能使之步行千里卻齊之彊兵哉？

translations.literal: Have faithful thus, wang again how make step walk thousand li repel Qi strong troops?
translations.idiomatic: One so faithful—how could Your Majesty make him walk a thousand li to repel Qi's strong troops?

sentences.zh: 臣所謂以忠信得罪於上者也。」

translations.literal: Subject called with loyal faithful get crime from above.
translations.idiomatic: This is what your minister calls getting into trouble with superiors because of loyalty and faith.'

sentences.zh: 燕王曰：「若不忠信耳，豈有以忠信而得罪者乎？」

translations.literal: Yan Wang said: If not loyal faithful, how have with loyal faithful get crime?
translations.idiomatic: The King of Yan said: 'If you are not loyal and faithful, then fine—but how can one get into trouble because of loyalty and faith?'

sentences.zh: 蘇秦曰：「不然。

translations.literal: Su Qin said: Not so.
translations.idiomatic: Su Qin said: 'Not so.

sentences.zh: 臣聞客有遠為吏而其妻私於人者，其夫將來，其私者憂之，妻曰『勿憂，吾已作藥酒待之矣』。

translations.literal: Subject heard guest far become official his wife private with person, his husband will come, private fear, wife said no worry, I already make poison wine await.
translations.idiomatic: Your minister has heard of a traveler who went far away to become an official, but his wife was privately involved with another man. When her husband was about to return, her lover became worried. The wife said, 'Don't worry, I have already prepared poisoned wine to await him.'

sentences.zh: 居三日，其夫果至，妻使妾舉藥酒進之。

translations.literal: After three days, husband indeed come, wife make concubine raise poison wine advance.
translations.idiomatic: After three days, her husband indeed arrived. The wife had her concubine raise the poisoned wine and present it to him.

sentences.zh: 妾欲言酒之有藥，則恐其逐主母也，欲勿言乎，則恐其殺主父也。

translations.literal: Concubine wish speak wine have poison, then fear expel main mother, wish not speak, then fear kill main father.
translations.idiomatic: The concubine wished to speak of the poison in the wine, but feared that would result in her mistress being driven out. If she did not speak, she feared that her master would be killed.

sentences.zh: 於是乎詳僵而棄酒。

translations.literal: Then feign stiff abandon wine.
translations.idiomatic: Therefore she pretended to go stiff and dropped the wine.

sentences.zh: 主父大怒，笞之五十。

translations.literal: Main father greatly angry, cane fifty.
translations.idiomatic: The master became greatly angry and caned her fifty strokes.

sentences.zh: 故妾一僵而覆酒，上存主父，下存主母，然而不免於笞，惡在乎忠信之無罪也？

translations.literal: Therefore concubine one stiff abandon wine, above preserve main father, below preserve main mother, yet not avoid cane, where in loyal faithful no crime?
translations.idiomatic: Therefore I stiffened my body and overturned the wine, preserving my master above and my mistress below, yet I could not avoid the cane. Where then is the innocence of loyalty and faithfulness?

sentences.zh: 夫臣之過，不幸而類是乎！」

translations.literal: Subject error, unfortunate similar this!
translations.idiomatic: My subject's error unfortunately is similar to this!'

sentences.zh: 燕王曰：「先生復就故官。」

translations.literal: Yan Wang said: Mister again take old office.
translations.idiomatic: The King of Yan said: 'Sir, return to your former office.'

sentences.zh: 益厚遇之。

translations.literal: Increase thick treat.
translations.idiomatic: He treated him even more generously.

sentences.zh: 易王母，文侯夫人也，與蘇秦私通。

translations.literal: Yi Wang mother, Wen Hou consort, with Su Qin private connect.
translations.idiomatic: King Yi's mother, who was Marquis Wen's consort, had a private affair with Su Qin.

sentences.zh: 燕王知之，而事之加厚。

translations.literal: Yan Wang know, yet affairs increase thick.
translations.idiomatic: The King of Yan knew of it, yet treated him even more generously.

sentences.zh: 蘇秦恐誅，乃說燕王曰：「臣居燕不能使燕重，而在齊則燕必重。」

translations.literal: Su Qin fear execute, then advise Yan Wang: Subject dwell Yan cannot make Yan heavy, in Qi then Yan certainly heavy.
translations.idiomatic: Su Qin feared execution, so he advised the King of Yan, saying: 'Your subject dwelling in Yan cannot make Yan important, but in Qi, Yan will certainly become important.'

sentences.zh: 燕王曰：「唯先生之所為。」

translations.literal: Yan Wang said: Only mister do.
translations.idiomatic: The King of Yan said: 'Do as you, sir, see fit.'

sentences.zh: 於是蘇秦詳為得罪於燕而亡走齊，齊宣王以為客卿。

translations.literal: Then Su Qin feign get crime Yan flee go Qi, Qi Xuan Wang as guest qing.
translations.idiomatic: Then Su Qin pretended to commit a crime in Yan and fled to Qi. King Xuan of Qi made him a guest qing.

Su Qin fear execute, then advise Yan Wang: Subject dwell Yan cannot make Yan heavy, in Qi then Yan certainly heavy. Yan Wang said: Only mister do. Then Su Qin feign get crime Yan flee go Qi, Qi Xuan Wang as guest qing.

sentences.zh: 齊宣王卒，湣王即位，說湣王厚葬以明孝，高宮室大苑囿以明得意，欲破敝齊而為燕。

translations.literal: Qi Xuan Wang die, Min Wang establish, advise Min Wang thick burial show filial, high palaces great parks show get intention, wish break exhaust Qi become Yan.
translations.idiomatic: King Xuan of Qi died, and King Min ascended the throne. Su Qin advised King Min to have thick burials to show filial piety, build high palaces and great parks to show satisfaction, desiring to break and exhaust Qi to benefit Yan.

sentences.zh: 燕易王卒，燕噲立為王。

translations.literal: Yan Yi Wang die, Yan Kuai establish wang.
translations.idiomatic: King Yi of Yan died, and Yan Kuai was established as king.

sentences.zh: 其後齊大夫多與蘇秦爭寵者，而使人刺蘇秦，不死，殊而走。

translations.literal: Afterward Qi grand masters many with Su Qin contend favor, make person stab Su Qin, not die, wound flee.
translations.idiomatic: Afterward, many Qi grand masters who contended for favor with Su Qin sent someone to stab Su Qin. He did not die, but was wounded and fled.

sentences.zh: 齊王使人求賊，不得。

translations.literal: Qi Wang make person seek assassin, not obtain.
translations.idiomatic: The King of Qi sent people to seek the assassin, but could not find him.

sentences.zh: 蘇秦且死，乃謂齊王曰：「臣即死，車裂臣以徇於市，曰『蘇秦為燕作亂於齊』，如此則臣之賊必得矣。」

translations.literal: Su Qin about die, then tell Qi Wang: Subject die, cart tear subject parade market, say Su Qin for Yan make rebellion Qi, like this subject assassin certainly obtain.
translations.idiomatic: Su Qin, about to die, then told the King of Qi: 'When your subject dies, cart-tear my body and parade it through the market, saying "Su Qin made rebellion in Qi for Yan." In this way, your subject's assassin will certainly be found.'

sentences.zh: 於是如其言，而殺蘇秦者果自出，齊王因而誅之。

translations.literal: Then like his words, kill Su Qin self come out, Qi Wang then execute.
translations.idiomatic: Then they did as he said, and the one who killed Su Qin indeed came forward himself. The King of Qi then executed him.

sentences.zh: 燕聞之曰：「甚矣，齊之為蘇生報仇也！」

translations.literal: Yan heard: Extreme, Qi for Su avenge!
translations.idiomatic: Yan heard of it and said: 'How extreme! Qi avenges Su Qin even after his death!'

Then like his words, kill Su Qin self come out, Qi Wang then execute. Yan heard: Extreme, Qi for Su avenge!

sentences.zh: 蘇秦既死，其事大泄。

translations.literal: Su Qin already die, his affairs greatly leak.
translations.idiomatic: After Su Qin died, his affairs were greatly revealed.

sentences.zh: 齊後聞之，乃恨怒燕。

translations.literal: Qi afterward hear, then hate angry Yan.
translations.idiomatic: Qi afterward heard of it and then hated and was angry at Yan.

sentences.zh: 燕甚恐。

translations.literal: Yan very fear.
translations.idiomatic: Yan was very fearful.

sentences.zh: 蘇秦之弟曰代，代弟蘇厲，見兄遂，亦皆學。

translations.literal: Su Qin brother called Dai, Dai brother Su Li, see brother success, also all study.
translations.idiomatic: Su Qin's younger brother was called Dai, and Dai's younger brother was Su Li. Seeing their elder brother's success, they all studied as well.

sentences.zh: 及蘇秦死，代乃求見燕王，欲襲故事。

translations.literal: Su Qin die, Dai then seek see Yan Wang, wish continue old affair.
translations.idiomatic: When Su Qin died, Dai then sought to see the King of Yan, desiring to continue the old affairs.

sentences.zh: 曰：「臣，東周之鄙人也。

translations.literal: Said: Subject, Dong Zhou lowly person.
translations.idiomatic: He said: 'Your subject is a lowly person from Eastern Zhou.

sentences.zh: 竊聞大王義甚高，鄙人不敏，釋鉏耨而干大王。

translations.literal: Secret hear great wang righteousness very high, lowly person not intelligent, abandon hoe sickle dry great wang.
translations.idiomatic: I have secretly heard that Your Majesty's righteousness is very high. This lowly person is not intelligent, but has abandoned hoe and sickle to approach Your Majesty.'

sentences.zh: 至於邯鄲，所見者絀於所聞於東周，臣竊負其志。

translations.literal: To Handan, seen inferior to heard Dong Zhou, subject secretly bear his ambition.
translations.idiomatic: Arriving at Handan, what I saw was inferior to what I heard in Eastern Zhou. Your subject secretly bore his ambition.

sentences.zh: 及至燕廷，觀王之群臣下吏，王，天下之明王也。」

translations.literal: To Yan court, observe wang ministers officials, wang, world bright wang.
translations.idiomatic: Arriving at the Yan court and observing Your Majesty's ministers and officials—Your Majesty is the world's bright king.'

sentences.zh: 燕王曰：「子所謂明王者何如也？」

translations.literal: Yan Wang said: You called bright wang what like?
translations.idiomatic: The King of Yan said: 'What is this bright king you speak of like?'

sentences.zh: 對曰：「臣聞明王務聞其過，不欲聞其善，臣請謁王之過。

translations.literal: Reply: Subject heard bright wang strive hear his error, not wish hear his good, subject please report wang error.
translations.idiomatic: He replied: 'Your minister has heard that enlightened kings strive to hear their errors, not desiring to hear their good. Your minister requests to report Your Majesty's errors.

sentences.zh: 夫齊、趙者，燕之仇讎也；

translations.literal: Qi Zhao, Yan enemy;
translations.idiomatic: Now Qi and Zhao are Yan's enemies;

sentences.zh: 楚、魏者，燕之援國也。

translations.literal: Chu Wei, Yan aid state.
translations.idiomatic: Chu and Wei are Yan's supporting states.

sentences.zh: 今王奉仇讎以伐援國，非所以利燕也。

translations.literal: Now wang serve enemy attack aid state, not so benefit Yan.
translations.idiomatic: Now Your Majesty serves enemies to attack supporting states—this is not the way to benefit Yan.

sentences.zh: 王自慮之，此則計過，無以聞者，非忠臣也。」

translations.literal: Wang self consider, this plan error, no to hear, not loyal minister.
translations.idiomatic: Your Majesty should consider this yourself—this is a mistaken plan. Those who do not speak of it to hear are not loyal ministers.'

sentences.zh: 王曰：「夫齊者固寡人之讎，所欲伐也，直患國敝力不足也。

translations.literal: Wang said: Qi certainly my enemy, desire attack, only suffer state depleted strength insufficient.
translations.idiomatic: The king said: 'Qi is certainly my enemy, and I desire to attack it. I only suffer from my state being depleted and strength insufficient.

sentences.zh: 子能以燕伐齊，則寡人舉國委子。」

translations.literal: You can with Yan attack Qi, I whole state entrust you.
translations.idiomatic: If you can use Yan to attack Qi, then I will entrust my whole state to you.'

sentences.zh: 對曰：「凡天下戰國七，燕處弱焉。

translations.literal: Reply: All world battle states seven, Yan dwell weak.
translations.idiomatic: He replied: 'In all the world there are seven warring states, and Yan dwells in weakness among them.

sentences.zh: 獨戰則不能，有所附則無不重。

translations.literal: Alone battle cannot, have attach then none not heavy.
translations.idiomatic: Fighting alone it cannot, but if it has attachments, then none will not become important.

sentences.zh: 南附楚，楚重；

translations.literal: South attach Chu, Chu heavy;
translations.idiomatic: Attaching south to Chu, Chu becomes important;

sentences.zh: 西附秦，秦重；

translations.literal: West attach Qin, Qin heavy;
translations.idiomatic: Attaching west to Qin, Qin becomes important;

sentences.zh: 中附韓、魏，韓、魏重。

translations.literal: Middle attach Han Wei, Han Wei heavy.
translations.idiomatic: Attaching centrally to Han and Wei, Han and Wei become important.

sentences.zh: 且茍所附之國重，此必使王重矣。

translations.literal: Moreover if attach state heavy, this certainly make wang heavy.
translations.idiomatic: Moreover, if the state attached to becomes important, this will certainly make Your Majesty important.

sentences.zh: 今夫齊，長主而自用也。

translations.literal: Now Qi, long jun self use.
translations.idiomatic: Now as for Qi, it has a long-standing ruler who uses himself.

sentences.zh: 南攻楚五年，畜聚竭；

translations.literal: South attack Chu five years, stores exhaust;
translations.idiomatic: Attacking south to Chu for five years, stores are exhausted;

sentences.zh: 西困秦三年，士卒罷敝；

translations.literal: West exhaust Qin three years, soldiers tired depleted;
translations.idiomatic: Exhausting west to Qin for three years, soldiers are tired and depleted;

sentences.zh: 北與燕人戰，覆三軍，得二將。

translations.literal: North with Yan battle, overturn three armies, obtain two generals.
translations.idiomatic: Battling north with Yan people, overturning three armies, obtaining two generals.

sentences.zh: 然而以其餘兵南面舉五千乘之大宋，而包十二諸侯。

translations.literal: Yet with remaining troops south face raise five thousand chariots great Song, surround twelve feudal lords.
translations.idiomatic: Yet with its remaining troops facing south, raising the great Song of five thousand chariots, surrounding the twelve feudal lords.

sentences.zh: 此其君欲得，其民力竭，惡足取乎！

translations.literal: This its jun desire obtain, its people strength exhaust, evil sufficient take?
translations.idiomatic: This—its ruler desires to obtain it, but its people's strength is exhausted. How is it sufficient to take?

sentences.zh: 且臣聞之，數戰則民勞，久師則兵敝矣。」

translations.literal: Moreover subject heard, frequent battle then people labor, long campaign then troops depleted.
translations.idiomatic: Moreover, your minister has heard that frequent battles then people labor, long campaigns then troops are depleted.'

sentences.zh: 燕王曰：「吾聞齊有清濟、濁河可以為固，長城、鉅防足以為塞，誠有之乎？」

translations.literal: Yan Wang said: I heard Qi have Qing Ji, Zhu He can be solid, Great Wall, Ju Fang sufficient be barrier, truly have?
translations.idiomatic: The King of Yan said: 'I have heard that Qi has the Qingji and Zhuhe that can be solid, the Great Wall and Jufang sufficient to be barriers. Is this truly so?'

sentences.zh: 對曰：「天時不與，雖有清濟、濁河，惡足以為固！

translations.literal: Reply: Heaven time not help, though have Qing Ji, Zhu He, evil sufficient be solid!
translations.idiomatic: He replied: 'Heaven's timing does not help. Though there are Qingji and Zhuhe, how are they sufficient to be solid?

sentences.zh: 民力罷敝，雖有長城、鉅防，惡足以為塞！

translations.literal: People strength tired depleted, though have Great Wall, Ju Fang, evil sufficient be barrier!
translations.idiomatic: People's strength is tired and depleted. Though there are the Great Wall and Jufang, how are they sufficient to be barriers?

sentences.zh: 且異日濟西不師，所以備趙也；

translations.literal: Moreover different day Ji West not campaign, so prepare Zhao;
translations.idiomatic: Moreover, in former days, the west of Ji did not campaign, which was to prepare for Zhao;

sentences.zh: 河北不師，所以備燕也。

translations.literal: Hebei not campaign, so prepare Yan.
translations.idiomatic: Hebei did not campaign, which was to prepare for Yan.

sentences.zh: 今濟西河北盡已役矣，封內敝矣。

translations.literal: Now Ji West Hebei all already service, within borders depleted.
translations.idiomatic: Now the west of Ji and Hebei are all already in service, within the borders depleted.

sentences.zh: 夫驕君必好利，而亡國之臣必貪於財。

translations.literal: Arrogant jun certainly good profit, perish state minister certainly greedy wealth.
translations.idiomatic: Now arrogant rulers certainly love profit, while ministers of perishing states are certainly greedy for wealth.

sentences.zh: 王誠能無羞從子母弟以為質，寶珠玉帛以事左右，彼將有德燕而輕亡宋，則齊可亡已。」

translations.literal: Wang truly can no shame take mother younger brother as hostage, treasure pearl jade silk serve left right, they will have virtue Yan light perish Song, then Qi can perish already.
translations.idiomatic: If Your Majesty can truly without shame take your mother's younger brother as hostage and treasure pearls, jade, and silks to serve the left and right, they will have virtue toward Yan and lightly perish Song, then Qi can already perish.'

sentences.zh: 燕王曰：「吾終以子受命於天矣。」

translations.literal: Yan Wang said: I finally with you receive command heaven.
translations.idiomatic: The King of Yan said: 'I finally receive the command of Heaven with you.'

sentences.zh: 燕乃使一子質於齊。

translations.literal: Yan then make one son hostage Qi.
translations.idiomatic: Yan then sent one son as hostage to Qi.

translations.literal: Su Li because Yan hostage son seek see Qi Wang.

translations.idiomatic: Yet Your Majesty does it in order to obtain trust from Qi.

translations.idiomatic: Qi will add to its lack of trust in Your Majesty, and will be even more jealous of Yan—this is Your Majesty's mistaken plan.

translations.idiomatic: The armor of Hanzhong, riding boats emerging from Ba, riding summer waters down the Han, in four days arriving at Wuzhu.

sentences.zh: 寡人積甲宛東下隨，智者不及謀，勇土不及怒，寡人如射隼矣。

translations.literal: I store armor Wan east down Sui, wise not time plan, brave soldiers not time angry, I like shoot falcon.
translations.idiomatic: I store armor east of Wan down to Sui. The wise will not have time to plan, the brave soldiers will not have time to be angry. I will be like shooting a falcon.

sentences.zh: 王乃欲待天下之攻函谷，不亦遠乎！』

translations.literal: Wang desire await world attack Hangu, not far!
translations.idiomatic: Your Majesty desires to await the world's attack on Hangu—isn't that far off!'

sentences.zh: 楚王為是故，十七年事秦。

translations.literal: Chu Wang for this reason, seventeen years serve Qin.
translations.idiomatic: The King of Chu served Qin for seventeen years because of this reason.

translations.literal: Warn Chu: Shu land armor, ride boat float Wen, ride summer water down Jiang, five days arrive Ying. Han Zhong armor, ride boat emerge Ba, ride summer water down Han, four days arrive Wu Zhu. I store armor Wan east down Sui, wise not time plan, brave soldiers not time angry, I like shoot falcon. Wang desire await world attack Hangu, not far! Chu Wang for this reason, seventeen years serve Qin.

sentences.zh: 「秦正告韓曰：『我起乎少曲，一日而斷大行。

translations.literal: Qin correct warn Han: I rise Shao Qu, one day break Da Xing.
translations.idiomatic: 'Qin correctly warned Han saying: 'I rise at Shaoqu and in one day break Daxing.

sentences.zh: 我起乎宜陽而觸平陽，二日而莫不盡繇。

translations.literal: I rise Yi Yang touch Ping Yang, two days none not all conscript.
translations.idiomatic: I rise at Yiyang and touch Pingyang, in two days none are not all conscripted.

sentences.zh: 我離兩周而觸鄭，五日而國舉。』

translations.literal: I leave two Zhou touch Zheng, five days state raise.
translations.idiomatic: I leave the two Zhous and touch Zheng, in five days the state is raised.'

sentences.zh: 韓氏以為然，故事秦。

translations.literal: Han clan consider correct, serve Qin.
translations.idiomatic: The Han clan considered it correct, and thus served Qin.

translations.literal: Qin correct warn Han: I rise Shao Qu, one day break Da Xing. I rise Yi Yang touch Ping Yang, two days none not all conscript. I leave two Zhou touch Zheng, five days state raise. Han clan consider correct, serve Qin.

sentences.zh: 「秦正告魏曰：『我舉安邑，塞女戟，韓氏太原卷。

translations.literal: Qin correct warn Wei: I raise An Yi, block Nv Ji, Han Tai Yuan Juan.
translations.idiomatic: 'Qin correctly warned Wei saying: 'I raise at Anyi, block Nvji, the Han clan Taiyuan curls.

sentences.zh: 我下軹，道南陽，封冀，包兩周。

translations.literal: I descend Zhi, road Nan Yang, seal Ji, surround two Zhou.
translations.idiomatic: I descend at Zhi, road to Nanyang, seal Ji, surround the two Zhous.

sentences.zh: 乘夏水，浮輕舟，錟弩在前，錟戈在後，決滎口，魏無大梁；

translations.literal: Ride summer water, float light boats, strong crossbows front, strong halberds rear, break Ying mouth, Wei no Da Liang;
translations.idiomatic: Riding summer waters, floating light boats, strong crossbows in front, strong halberds in rear, breaking Yingkou—Wei has no Daliang;

sentences.zh: 決白馬之口，魏無外黃、濟陽；

translations.literal: Break Bai Ma mouth, Wei no Wai Huang, Ji Yang;
translations.idiomatic: breaking Baima mouth—Wei has no Waihuang, Jiyang;

sentences.zh: 決宿胥之口，魏無虛、頓丘。

translations.literal: Break Su Xu mouth, Wei no Xu, Dun Qiu.
translations.idiomatic: breaking Suxu mouth—Wei has no Xu, Dunqiu.

sentences.zh: 陸攻則擊河內，水攻則滅大梁。』

translations.literal: Land attack then strike He Nei, water attack then extinguish Da Liang.
translations.idiomatic: Land attack then strikes Henan, water attack then extinguishes Daliang.'

sentences.zh: 魏氏以為然，故事秦。

translations.literal: Wei clan consider correct, serve Qin.
translations.idiomatic: The Wei clan considered it correct, and thus served Qin.

translations.literal: Qin correct warn Wei: I raise An Yi, block Nv Ji, Han Tai Yuan Juan. I descend Zhi, road Nan Yang, seal Ji, surround two Zhou. Ride summer water, float light boats, strong crossbows front, strong halberds rear, break Ying mouth, Wei no Da Liang; Break Bai Ma mouth, Wei no Wai Huang, Ji Yang; Break Su Xu mouth, Wei no Xu, Dun Qiu. Land attack then strike He Nei, water attack then extinguish Da Liang. Wei clan consider correct, serve Qin.

sentences.zh: 「秦欲攻安邑，恐齊救之，則以宋委於齊。

translations.literal: Qin desire attack An Yi, fear Qi save, then with Song entrust Qi.
translations.idiomatic: 'Qin desired to attack Anyi, but feared Qi would save it, so entrusted Song to Qi.

sentences.zh: 曰：『宋王無道，為木人以（寫）［象］寡人，射其面。

translations.literal: Said: Song Wang no way, make wood person imitate me, shoot its face.
translations.idiomatic: Saying: 'The King of Song is without the Way. He made a wooden person to imitate me and shot its face.

sentences.zh: 寡人地絕兵遠，不能攻也。

translations.literal: I land cut troops far, cannot attack.
translations.idiomatic: My lands are cut off and troops far away. I cannot attack it.

sentences.zh: 王茍能破宋有之，寡人如自得之。』

translations.literal: Wang if can break Song have it, I like self obtain.
translations.idiomatic: If Your Majesty can break Song and have it, I will be like having obtained it myself.'

sentences.zh: 已得安邑，塞女戟，因以破宋為齊罪。

translations.literal: Already obtain An Yi, block Nv Ji, because break Song as Qi crime.
translations.idiomatic: Already obtained Anyi, blocked Nvji, and thus made breaking Song into Qi's crime.

translations.literal: Qin desire attack An Yi, fear Qi save, then with Song entrust Qi. Said: Song Wang no way, make wood person imitate me, shoot its face. I land cut troops far, cannot attack. Wang if can break Song have it, I like self obtain. Already obtain An Yi, block Nv Ji, because break Song as Qi crime.

sentences.zh: 「秦欲攻韓，恐天下救之，則以齊委於天下。

translations.literal: Qin desire attack Han, fear world save, then with Qi entrust world.
translations.idiomatic: 'Qin desired to attack Han, but feared the world would save it, so entrusted Qi to the world.

sentences.zh: 曰：『齊王四與寡人約，四欺寡人，必率天下以攻寡人者三。

translations.literal: Said: Qi Wang four with I pact, four deceive I, must lead world attack I three.
translations.idiomatic: Saying: 'The King of Qi made four pacts with me, four times deceived me. Three times he must lead the world to attack me.

sentences.zh: 有齊無秦，有秦無齊，必伐之，必亡之。』

translations.literal: Have Qi no Qin, have Qin no Qi, must attack, must perish.
translations.idiomatic: If there is Qi there is no Qin, if there is Qin there is no Qi—I must attack it, I must cause its perishing.'

sentences.zh: 已得宜陽、少曲，致藺、［離］石，因以破齊為天下罪。

translations.literal: Already obtain Yi Yang, Shao Qu, send Lin, Li Shi, because break Qi as world crime.
translations.idiomatic: Already obtained Yiyang and Shaoqu, sent Lin and Lishi, and thus made breaking Qi into the world's crime.

translations.literal: Qin desire attack Han, fear world save, then with Qi entrust world. Said: Qi Wang four with I pact, four deceive I, must lead world attack I three. Have Qi no Qin, have Qin no Qi, must attack, must perish. Already obtain Yi Yang, Shao Qu, send Lin, Li Shi, because break Qi as world crime.

sentences.zh: 「秦欲攻魏重楚，則以南陽委於楚。

translations.literal: Qin desire attack Wei heavy Chu, then with Nan Yang entrust Chu.
translations.idiomatic: 'Qin desired to attack Wei and strengthen Chu, so entrusted Nanyang to Chu.

sentences.zh: 曰：『寡人固與韓且絕矣。

translations.literal: Said: I certainly with Han already cut.
translations.idiomatic: Saying: 'I certainly have already cut relations with Han.

sentences.zh: 殘均陵，塞鄳阸，茍利於楚，寡人如自有之。』

translations.literal: Damage Jun Ling, block Dong E, if profit Chu, I like self have.
translations.idiomatic: Damage Junling, block Dong'e. If it profits Chu, I will be like having it myself.'

sentences.zh: 魏棄與國而合於秦，因以塞鄳阸為楚罪。

translations.literal: Wei abandon ally state unite Qin, because block Dong E as Chu crime.
translations.idiomatic: Wei abandoned its allied states and united with Qin, and thus made blocking Dong'e into Chu's crime.

translations.literal: Qin desire attack Wei heavy Chu, then with Nan Yang entrust Chu. Said: I certainly with Han already cut. Damage Jun Ling, block Dong E, if profit Chu, I like self have. Wei abandon ally state unite Qin, because block Dong E as Chu crime.

sentences.zh: 「兵困於林中，重燕、趙，以膠東委於燕，以濟西委於趙。

translations.literal: Troops trapped Lin Zhong, heavy Yan Zhao, with Jiao Dong entrust Yan, with Ji Xi entrust Zhao.
translations.idiomatic: 'Troops were trapped in Linzhong, strengthening Yan and Zhao, entrusting Jiaodong to Yan, entrusting Jixi to Zhao.

sentences.zh: 已得講於魏，至公子延，因犀首屬行而攻趙。

translations.literal: Already obtain lecture Wei, to Gong Zi Yan, because Xi Shou continue go attack Zhao.
translations.idiomatic: Already obtained peace with Wei, arrived at Gongzi Yan, and because of Xi Shou continuing on attacked Zhao.

translations.literal: Troops trapped Lin Zhong, heavy Yan Zhao, with Jiao Dong entrust Yan, with Ji Xi entrust Zhao. Already obtain lecture Wei, to Gong Zi Yan, because Xi Shou continue go attack Zhao.

sentences.zh: 「兵傷於譙石，而遇敗於陽馬，而重魏，則以葉、蔡委於魏。

translations.literal: Troops injured Qiao Shi, encounter defeat Yang Ma, heavy Wei, then with Ye Cai entrust Wei.
translations.idiomatic: 'Troops were injured at Qiaoshi, and encountered defeat at Yangma, and strengthened Wei, then entrusted Ye and Cai to Wei.

sentences.zh: 已得講於趙，則劫魏，［魏］不為割。

translations.literal: Already obtain lecture Zhao, then coerce Wei, Wei not cede.
translations.idiomatic: Already obtained peace with Zhao, then coerced Wei, but Wei would not cede.

sentences.zh: 困則使太后弟穰侯為和，嬴則兼欺舅與母。

translations.literal: Trapped then make Empress Dowager younger brother Rang Hou make peace, win then together deceive uncle mother.
translations.idiomatic: When trapped, then make the Empress Dowager's younger brother Lord Rang make peace; when winning, then together deceive uncle and mother.

translations.literal: Troops injured Qiao Shi, encounter defeat Yang Ma, heavy Wei, then with Ye Cai entrust Wei. Already obtain lecture Zhao, then coerce Wei, Wei not cede. Trapped then make Empress Dowager younger brother Rang Hou make peace, win then together deceive uncle mother.

sentences.zh: 「適燕者曰『以膠東』，適趙者曰『以濟西』，適魏者曰『以葉、蔡』，適楚者曰『以塞鄳阸』，適齊者曰『以宋』，此必令言如循環，用兵如刺蜚，母不能制，舅不能約。

translations.literal: Go Yan say with Jiao Dong, go Zhao say with Ji Xi, go Wei say with Ye Cai, go Chu say with block Dong E, go Qi say with Song, this must make words like cycle, use troops like stab fly, mother cannot control, uncle cannot bind.
translations.idiomatic: To those going to Yan they say 'with Jiaodong,' to those going to Zhao they say 'with Jixi,' to those going to Wei they say 'with Ye and Cai,' to those going to Chu they say 'with blocking Dong'e,' to those going to Qi they say 'with Song.' This must make words like a cycle, use troops like stabbing flies. Mother cannot control, uncle cannot bind.

translations.literal: Go Yan say with Jiao Dong, go Zhao say with Ji Xi, go Wei say with Ye Cai, go Chu say with block Dong E, go Qi say with Song, this must make words like cycle, use troops like stab fly, mother cannot control, uncle cannot bind.

sentences.zh: 「龍賈之戰，岸門之戰，封陵之戰，高商之戰，趙莊之戰，秦之所殺三晉之民數百萬，今其生者皆死秦之孤也。

translations.literal: Long Jia battle, An Men battle, Feng Ling battle, Gao Shang battle, Zhao Zhuang battle, Qin killed San Jin people several hundred thousand, now their living all die Qin orphans.
translations.idiomatic: 'The battle of Longjia, the battle of Anmen, the battle of Fengling, the battle of Gaoshang, the battle of Zhaozhuang—Qin has killed several hundred thousand of the San Jin people. Now their living are all orphans who died to Qin.

sentences.zh: 西河之外，上雒之地，三川晉國之禍，三晉之半，秦禍如此其大也。

translations.literal: Xi He outside, Shang Luo land, San Chuan Jin state calamity, San Jin half, Qin calamity so great.
translations.idiomatic: Outside Xiheng, the lands of Shangluo, the calamity of the Sanchuan Jin states—half of the San Jin—Qin's calamity is so great.

sentences.zh: 而燕、趙之秦者，皆以爭事秦說其主，此臣之所大患也。」

translations.literal: Yan Zhao Qin, all with strive serve Qin persuade their lord, this subject great worry.
translations.idiomatic: Yet those in Yan and Zhao who go to Qin all strive to serve Qin and persuade their lords—this is my subject's great worry.'

translations.literal: Long Jia battle, An Men battle, Feng Ling battle, Gao Shang battle, Zhao Zhuang battle, Qin killed San Jin people several hundred thousand, now their living all die Qin orphans. Xi He outside, Shang Luo land, San Chuan Jin state calamity, San Jin half, Qin calamity so great. Yan Zhao Qin, all with strive serve Qin persuade their lord, this subject great worry.

sentences.zh: 燕昭王不行。

translations.literal: Yan Zhao Wang not do.
translations.idiomatic: King Zhao of Yan did not do it.

sentences.zh: 蘇代復重於燕。

translations.literal: Su Dai again heavy Yan.
translations.idiomatic: Su Dai again became important in Yan.

translations.literal: Yan Zhao Wang not do. Su Dai again heavy Yan.

sentences.zh: 燕使約諸侯從親如蘇秦時，或從或不，而天下由此宗蘇氏之從約。

translations.literal: Yan sent envoys to make pacts with the feudal lords for a united alliance like in Su Qin's time. Some followed and some did not, but from this the world came to venerate the Su clan's alliance pact.
translations.idiomatic: Yan sent envoys to make pacts with the feudal lords for a united alliance like in Su Qin's time. Some followed and some did not, but from this the world came to venerate the Su clan's alliance pact.

sentences.zh: 代、厲皆以壽死，名顯諸侯。

translations.literal: Dai, Li all with longevity die, name manifest feudal lords.
translations.idiomatic: Dai and Li all died of longevity, their names manifest among the feudal lords.

translations.literal: Yan make pact feudal lords form alliance like Su Qin time, some follow some not, world from this venerate Su clan alliance pact. Dai, Li all with longevity die, name manifest feudal lords.

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：蘇秦兄弟三人，皆游說諸侯以顯名，其術長於權變。

translations.literal: Grand Historian said: Su Qin brothers three, all travel persuade feudal lords manifest name, their arts long power change.
translations.idiomatic: The Grand Historian said: The three Su Qin brothers all traveled persuading the feudal lords to manifest their names. Their arts were long in power and change.

sentences.zh: 而蘇秦被反閒以死，天下共笑之，諱學其術。

translations.literal: Su Qin suffer counter espionage die, world together laugh, avoid study his arts.
translations.idiomatic: Yet Su Qin suffered counter-espionage and died. The world together laughed at him and avoided studying his arts.

sentences.zh: 然世言蘇秦多異，異時事有類之者皆附之蘇秦。

translations.literal: Yet world speak Su Qin many strange, strange time affairs have similar attach to Su Qin.
translations.idiomatic: Yet the world speaks of Su Qin as having many strange things. Affairs from strange times that have similarities are all attached to Su Qin.

sentences.zh: 夫蘇秦起閭閻，連六國從親，此其智有過人者。

translations.literal: Su Qin rise humble door, connect six states alliance, this his wisdom surpass people.
translations.idiomatic: Now Su Qin rose from humble doors and connected the six states in alliance. This was his wisdom surpassing people.

sentences.zh: 吾故列其行事，次其時序，毋令獨蒙惡聲焉。

translations.literal: I therefore list his conduct affairs, sequence his time order, not let alone bear evil reputation.
translations.idiomatic: I therefore list his conduct and affairs, sequence his chronological order, so as not to let him alone bear an evil reputation.

translations.literal: Grand Historian said: Su Qin brothers three, all travel persuade feudal lords manifest name, their arts long power change. Su Qin suffer counter espionage die, world together laugh, avoid study his arts. Yet world speak Su Qin many strange, strange time affairs have similar attach to Su Qin. Su Qin rise humble door, connect six states alliance, this his wisdom surpass people. I therefore list his conduct affairs, sequence his time order, not let alone bear evil reputation.
